Wand.name: 魔杖
Wand.description: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{奥术法器}是一种利用宝石或是雕刻来引导奥术魔法的物品。术士、魔契师和法师可以使用这种物品作为法器。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .l4INK64V3wIju2AS]] 攻击。

Blinding Flash.name: 目盲闪光
Blinding Flash.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见一点为中心半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]] 尺的球状区域内的所有生物。

失败： [[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

成功：仅半伤。

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至匪帮欺诈师的下一回合开始。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowcase]] 施展以下一道法术，使用智力作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]（4 环版本）, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]（已计入AC）, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMajorImage]

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
你改变自身以及随身的衣物、护甲、武器等在你身上的所有物。该效应在法术终止时结束。肉眼看来你的身高可以有 1 尺的增减，体态可胖可瘦。你必须选择一个和你肢体基础排列方式一致的形态。此外，幻术的影响范围由你决定。

此法术产生的变化无法应对物理检查。比如，你用此法术添了一顶帽子，那么现实物件会从帽子穿过去，且任何触碰帽子的人将摸不到任何东西。

如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Disguised.name: 乔装
Disguised.description: 一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻象
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础 AC 变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。目标着装护甲则法术提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Major Image.name: 高等幻影
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Scout.name: 斥候
Scout.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{Longbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}

Scouts

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Ia0dhEMIJJ7PVLVn caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Scout

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .jdOlqVzYs89JuqTB]] 和 [[/item .qhM3PIWgXdyRCeul]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Bandit Captain.name: 匪帮队长
Bandit Captain.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepPistol0000]{Pistol}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmStuddedLea]{Studded Leather Armor}

Bandits

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .w3cX0piuU875Hc2M]] 和 [[/item .2TB9ZSIbtbi4UtSv]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗那次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令那次攻击失手）。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

Bandit.name: 匪徒
Bandit.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLightCross]{Light Crossbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}

Bandits

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.ORyQoMthsD5YZa49 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Bandit

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.BOqXIilnnBRsQabZ caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 或 [[/item .mmTailSpike00000]] 发动共计三次攻击。

Phaerimm Agent.name: Phaerimm Agent
Phaerimm Agent.description:
Alien, Magic-Obsessed Manipulators

Phaerimm are malevolent alien beings that seek to dominate other sentient species. A phaerimm’s conical body ripples through the air, trailing behind a large, flat mouth ringed by four delicate arms. A phaerimm’s body tapers to a venomous stinger they prefer to use only when magical means fail them.

Ancient phaerimm devastated the once-powerful empire of Netheril. The phaerimm were imprisoned beneath the great desert of Anauroch, where they plot a return to their former dominion. Roll or choose a result from the Phaerimm Plots table as inspiration for what a phaerimm agent might be doing when encountered.

@embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.tables.RollTable.aifPhaerimmPlots rollable resultLabel="The Phaerimm Is …"]

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The phaerimm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

At Will: [[/item .pEhiVsn7tpKoz6xR]]{Detect Magic}, [[/item .ozub6AoxcwAzhZBw]]{Detect Thoughts}, [[/item .PexcN93VXsgT57aA]]{Mage Hand}

1/Day Each: [[/item .E6fYjUUZ0mXwABZC]]{Clairvoyance}, [[/item .wVxjEuMkpLWo409n]]{Major Image}, [[/item .ij2fAAlPK5yFwx5B]]{Synaptic Static}

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The phaerimm makes three attacks, using [[/item Dread Stinger]] or [[/item Mindwarp Ray]] in any combination.

Mindwarp Ray.name: Mindwarp Ray
Mindwarp Ray.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]., and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the phaerimm’s next turn.

Teleport.name: 传送
Teleport.description: The phaerimm teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Protective Magic.name: 护身魔法
Protective Magic.description: The phaerimm casts [[/item .0EN7pI6wKid62eU4]]{Counterspell} or [[/item .zSg8AXbTvTo6HcpO]]{Shield} in response to the spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Clairvoyance.name: 鹰眼术
Clairvoyance.description:
你在施法距离内某处创造一个隐形的传感器，该处可以是你熟悉的地点（你曾到访过或看见过的地方），也可以是你不熟悉的显眼处（比如一扇门后，拐角位置或树林里）。这一无形体且不受伤害的传感器会在法术持续期间停留在该地。

施展该法术时，你可以选择进行观察或是聆听。你可以通过传感器以所选的感官方式感测，如同你处在传感器所在的空间。你能够以一个附赠动作在观察和聆听之间切换。

可以看见传感器的生物（例如一名生物受益于识破隐形或 &Reference[truesight] 时）会看到传感器是一个拳头大小的发光球体。

materials.value: 一件价值 100+GP 的法器：选择聆听则为一个以珠宝装饰的号角，选择观察则为一颗玻璃眼珠

Major Image.name: 高等幻影
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Counterspell.name: 法术反制
Counterspell.description: 你试图打断一名正在施法的生物。该生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败则法术消散且毫无效果，并且用于施展法术的动作、附赠动作或反应随之浪费。如果那道法术是使用法术位施展的，则法术位并不会被消耗。

activation.condition: 当你看见范围内一名生物施展一道法术时执行

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: 一道看不见的力场制护盾浮现在你身旁，保护着你。在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]的伤害。

activation.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Synaptic Static.name: 突触静止
Synaptic Static.description:
选择施法距离内的一点，你引爆其间的心灵能量。以那一点为中心，半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物进行一次智力豁免检定。豁免失败的生物受到 8d6 心灵伤害，成功则伤害减半。

豁免失败的目标也会在接下来的 1 分钟内思想混乱。在此期间，目标每次进行攻击检定、属性检定和为维持专注而进行体质豁免检定时都需要从结果中减去一个 [[/r 1d6]] 。在目标的每个回合结束它都可以重新进行 [[/save ability=int dc=@attributes.spelldc format=long]] 检定，若成功将结束这个效应对自己的影响。

Muddled Thoughts.name: 思维混乱
Muddled Thoughts.description: 你每次进行攻击检定、属性检定和为维持专注而进行体质豁免检定时都需要从结果中减去一个 d6。在施法者的每一回合结束你都可以重新进行[[/save ability=int format=long]]{感知豁免}，若成功将结束此效应对自身的影响。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Region (Anauroch) Adventure for

Level 5 Characters

Negotiate the return of a hostage and the dangerous magic he carries.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifTheEyesOfAtar]{Roadside Inn}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.P45oEDgC1TaQaRsD]{The Eyes of At'ar}

Situation. A bandit gang called the Eyes of At’ar has kidnapped Sullivan Crase, an antiquarian employed by Candlekeep. The gang offers to exchange Sullivan for 10,000 GP, instructing that the exchange take place at a lonely caravansary along the Black Road called Kozah’s Whisper.

Hook. Janussi (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifArchmage00000]{Archmage}), Candlekeep’s Keeper of Tomes, meets the characters in a private room at a tavern in Baldur’s Gate and shares with them the ransom note detailing the gang’s demands. The Eyes of At’ar write they will be at Kozah’s Whisper in one month and will wait one month more for Candlekeep’s representatives to make the trade. After that, Sullivan will be killed. Janussi confides that Sullivan was carrying a scroll of priceless Netherese magic when he was abducted. She refuses to encourage the bandits by paying the ransom. She offers the party [[/award 1500GP]] plus expenses if they will travel to Kozah’s Whisper and secure Sullivan and the scroll.

Encounters

The adventure consists of these encounters.

Doing Their Homework. Characters might seek to use Candlekeep’s resources to learn more about their mission. Anyone wishing to enter the library must provide a work of writing the library doesn’t already have. Characters researching in the library learn the gang’s name refers to At’ar the Merciless, the Bedine god of the sun. Characters can acquire maps suggesting possible routes to Anauroch. An obscure scouting report describes the leader of the Eyes of At’ar as a mysterious “half-lion” spellcaster named Inixera (@UUID[Actor.aifLamia00000000]{Lamia}). The report cautions that the gang has eyes everywhere. You can find more information on Candlekeep to flesh out this part of the adventure in the Candlekeep Mysteries adventure anthology.

The Journey. The characters have a long journey ahead of them. One option is to take the Trade Way north to Daggerford, then turn east along the Delimbyr Trail until they reach the Black Road and Anauroch. Alternatively, the party might travel cross-country, skirting the Forest of Wyrms, Marsh of Chelimber, and Lonely Moor. Use the rules for @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbExploration00.JournalEntryPage.CIKNTZvYHNPixLRp]{travel} and journey stages in chapter 2 of the Dungeon Master’s Guide.

Kozah’s Whisper. Kozah’s Whisper is a caravansary halfway along the Black Road, in the middle of the Great Desert. Use the @UUID[Scene.aifTheEyesOfAtar]{Roadside Inn} map. Characters who used magic to travel to Kozah’s Whisper might get there before the bandits, but its more likely the gang has already arrived.

The caravansary is managed by a human woman named Enla Massine (Medium, Chaotic Neutral @UUID[Actor.aifCommoner00000]{Commoner}) who has survived in Anauroch by not getting involved in the business of her guests. She is assisted by her wife, Nari (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifAssassin00000]{Assassin}), who serves as a bouncer and general laborer. The two are fiercely loyal to each other. Their three adult children (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifCommoner00000]{Commoners}) work as cooks, grooms, and cleaning staff. Other guests at the caravansary include the following:

Lorna, a nosy human merchant (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifCommoner00000]{Commoner}) lingering at Kozah’s Rest while her pack animals recover from a difficult journey. Lorna is a source for gossip at the caravansary, and she can sell the party any gear they might need, including a few Spell Scrolls.

Mikkam, a halfling lieutenant in the Eyes of At’ar (Small, Chaotic Neutral @UUID[Actor.aifToughBoss0000]{Tough Boss}). He leads eight @UUID[Actor.aifTough00000000]{Toughs}.

Nama, a wandering elf mage (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifBanditDeceive]{Bandit Deceiver}) pursuing lost Netherese lore. If Nama learns about the Netherese scriptures, she might offer her services to the party in exchange for the scroll—or simply try to steal it.

Raheel, a human tracker (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifScout00000000]{Scout}). Raheel is looking for work. The party can hire him for 100 GP. He will spy on the Eyes of At’ar or anyone else the party directs him to, but he avoids combat.

The party has time to investigate the caravansary and guests while meeting with Mikkam to set up the exchange. Once convinced the party intends to make the deal, Mikkam sends word to Inixera, leader of the gang, at a bandit camp half a day away in the desert.

The Exchange. Inixera arrives a day after being sent for, with the bulk of the gang in tow. This includes four @UUID[Actor.aifBanditCaptain]{Bandit Captains} and two dozen @UUID[Actor.aifBandit0000000]{Bandits}, and Gnasher, Inixera’s pet @UUID[Actor.aifManticore0000]{Manticore}. Sullivan is manacled and gagged, in Gnasher’s care. Inixera has the Netherese texts in an elaborate scroll case, hidden in a simple sack.

When Inixera confronts the party, he changes the terms of the deal. He will release Sullivan if the party agrees to read the scroll aloud, right now, in the open yard of the caravansary. Inixera has read the scriptures and knows they summon a @UUID[Actor.aifPhaerimmAgent] (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifBestiary00000.JournalEntryPage.tS4vS4Wqd1A5Kljq]{chapter 9}). If the characters go through with this bargain, the phaerimm appears and fights them while Inixera looks on, cackling with glee. If they refuse, Inixera intends to feed Sullivan to Gnasher and keep the scrolls for himself.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.YsJCgr3GXtV3IU2X caption=false]

Blood Night.name: Blood Night
Blood Night.description:
A Location (Baldur's Gate) Adventure for

Level 4 Characters

Survive a lethal invitation.

Situation. The four wicked scions of Eomane House host a party that’s secretly a murderous competition to honor Bhaal.

Hook. The characters are invited to a decadent party at Eomane House on the wrong night.

Cunning Action.name: 灵巧动作
Cunning Action.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 执行 &Reference[Dash apply=false]、&Reference[Disengage apply=false] 或 &Reference[Hide apply=false] 动作。

Performer.description:

Uncanny Dodge.name: 直觉闪避
Uncanny Dodge.description: 触发：[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=NzfYZzkrG4qJ13to]]。响应：[[lookup @name lowercase]]因此次攻击受到的伤害减半（向下取整）。

Barbed Hide.name: 猬皮
Barbed Hide.description: 在 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的回合开始时，其对擒抱自己的生物或被其擒抱的生物造成造成 [[/damage average]] 伤害。

affects.special: it is grappling or any creature grappling it

Diabolical Restoration.name: 魔鬼复苏
Diabolical Restoration.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 于九层地狱之外死去，其身躯会化为硫磺烟雾消失，并立即在九层地狱某处获得一具新的身体，以满生命值复活。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmClaws000000000]] 和一次 [[/item .mmTail0000000000]] 攻击，或者发动两次 [[/item .mmHurlFlame00000]] 攻击。

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其被双爪擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description:
若你的生物体型不超过大型，则你被猬魔双爪擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 13，[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Hurl Flame.name: 投掷烈焰
Hurl Flame.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若目标为未被着装或携带的可燃物件，则目标被点燃。

Noble.name: 贵族
Noble.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmBreastplat]{Breastplate}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}

Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗那次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令那次攻击失手）。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

Component Pouch.name: 材料包
Component Pouch.description: 材料包是一种装有你法术所需的一切免费材料的防水小包。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 徒施展以下一道法术，使用智力作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]，法术攻击命中 +5）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIceKnife00]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0] （已计入AC），@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderwav]

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
你改变自身以及随身的衣物、护甲、武器等在你身上的所有物。该效应在法术终止时结束。肉眼看来你的身高可以有 1 尺的增减，体态可胖可瘦。你必须选择一个和你肢体基础排列方式一致的形态。此外，幻术的影响范围由你决定。

此法术产生的变化无法应对物理检查。比如，你用此法术添了一顶帽子，那么现实物件会从帽子穿过去，且任何触碰帽子的人将摸不到任何东西。

如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Disguised.name: 乔装
Disguised.description: 一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Ice Knife.name: 冰刃
Ice Knife.description:
你制造出一块冰晶裂片，并将它射向施法距离内的一个生物。你对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。若击中，目标受到 1d10 点穿刺伤害。无论击中与否，裂片都会在之后爆裂。目标和周围 5 尺范围内的每个生物必须通过一次敏捷豁免检定，否则受到 2d6 点寒冷伤害。

升环施法：使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，寒冷伤害就增加 1d6。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础 AC 变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。目标着装护甲则法术提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Thunderwave.name: 雷鸣波
Thunderwave.description:
你施放出一道雷鸣能量。在以你为源点 15 尺立方区域内的每名生物必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者将受到 2d8 点雷鸣伤害，并被推离 10 尺。豁免成功则只受一半伤害。

此外，所有完全位于该区域内且未被固定住的物件都将被推离 10 尺。该法术还会发出距你 300 尺内都能听见的雷霆巨响。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就提高 1d8。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

BGYUyh36nOQKX4Pr.name: 隐形术
BGYUyh36nOQKX4Pr.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts to resemble a rat (Speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., Fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., Climb 20 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Cultist Fanatic.name: 邪教狂信者
Cultist Fanatic.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol (Varies)}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}

Cultists

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.VICfYukXoYkWJ1yn caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Cultist Fanatic

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.DHw4tAz06WzLz07b caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]，法术攻击命中 +4）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{光亮术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{奇术}

2/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000]{命令术}

1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]{定身人类}

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器
Spiritual Weapon.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]，使用其施法动作的施法属性。

z817Et9IPt6qHawH.name: 灵体武器
z817Et9IPt6qHawH.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Command.name: Command
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Guard.name: 警卫
Guard.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{Spear}

Guards

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Zh9j3VBgGnsvq9x4 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Guard

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.IzCvcbHgZ8uPj9TU caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: 你必须拥有盾牌的受训才能从一面盾牌中获得其护甲等级的增益。

Ethereal Sight.name: 以太视界
Ethereal Sight.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处物质位面，其能够看见 60 尺内的以太位面，

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以如同穿过 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]一样穿过其他生物和物件。如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部则受到[[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] 伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .yf1Nf7oPWS4arOOL]] 攻击。

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness} spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

88qd0Ulz7AMzouDU.name: 以太化
88qd0Ulz7AMzouDU.description:
You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, where it overlaps with your current plane. You remain in the Border Ethereal for the duration. During this time, you can move in any direction. If you move up or down, every foot of movement costs an extra foot. You can perceive the plane you left, which looks gray, and you can't see anything there more than 60 feet away.

While on the Ethereal Plane, you can affect and be affected only by creatures, objects, and effects on that plane. Creatures that aren't on the Ethereal Plane can't perceive or interact with you unless a feature gives them the ability to do so.

When the spell ends, you return to the plane you left in the spot that corresponds to your space in the Border Ethereal. If you appear in an occupied space, you are shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and take Force damage equal to twice the number of feet you are moved.

This spell ends instantly if you cast it while you are on the Ethereal Plane or a plane that doesn't border it, such as one of the Outer Planes.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.You can target up to three willing creatures (including yourself) for each spell slot level above 7. The creatures must be within 10 feet of you when you cast the spell.

Horrific Visage.name: 恐惧面容
Horrific Visage.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]]-foot Cone that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and isn't an Undead.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直至报丧妖的下一回合开始。

Possession.name: 附身
Possession.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]] feet.

Failure: The target is possessed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]; the [[lookup @name lowercase]] disappears, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and loses control of its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] now controls the body, but the target retains awareness. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that specifically target Undead. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s game statistics are the same, except it uses the possessed target's Speed, as well as the target's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution modifiers.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 Hit Points or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] leaves as a Bonus Action. When the possession ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target, and the target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Possession for 24 hours.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态并失去对身体的控制。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Location (Baldur's Gate) Adventure for

Level 4 Characters

Survive a lethal invitation.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifEomaneHouse00]{Eomane House}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.QIsCIw3GL1yOAIAa]{Blood Night}

Situation. The four wicked scions of Eomane House (see “@UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifBaldursGateGa.JournalEntryPage.NQ1uNs56RPWjf6kN]{Upper City}”) host a party that’s secretly a murderous competition to honor Bhaal.

Hook. The characters are invited to a decadent party at Eomane House on the wrong night.

Encounters

The adventure consists of these encounters.

Pleasant Welcome. A @UUID[Actor.aifSpy0000000000]{Spy} serving Trentellar Eomane invites characters into the library, serves drinks, and introduces other guests, who tell the characters about the four Eomane siblings.

Murder Contest. Dolandre Eomane’s booming voice echoes through the house, gleefully informing guests the house is now magically sealed and the Eomanes are competing to murder the most guests for their patron, Bhaal. The other guests scatter and try to hide or escape.

Eomanes. The Eomanes roam the house separately. The family members are as follows:

Dolandre Eomane. Dolandre (Medium, Lawful Evil @UUID[Actor.aifPerformer0000]{Performer}) relishes in the violence, with a @UUID[Actor.aifBarbedDevil00]{Barbed Devil} named Mister Pointy Hugs at her side.

Nysene Eomane. Nysene (Medium, Lawful Evil @UUID[Actor.aifNoble00000000]{Noble}) pulls animals from a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgRustBagofTric]{Bag of Tricks} (rust) to torment her quarry.

Russora Eomane. Russora (Small, Neutral Evil @UUID[Actor.aifMageApprentic]{Mage Apprentice}) instructs four @UUID[Actor.aifImp0000000000]{Imp} minions to help her fight.

Trentellar Eomane. Trentellar (Medium, Neutral Evil @UUID[Actor.aifCultistFanati]{Cultist Fanatic}) commands four bloodthirsty @UUID[Actor.aifSpy0000000000]{Spies} who consider him a divine agent of Bhaal.

The House. Doors and windows exiting the house can’t be opened and have Immunity to all damage.

The Survivor. Before the party, the Eomanes ritually murdered their hirelings—whose corpses adorn various rooms—but they missed a human hireling named Bilwen (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifGuard00000000]{Guard}) who is hiding in the barracks. Bilwen shares that the only escape involves climbing down the outside of the house from the rooftop garden.

Ghost in the Garden. The Lawful Neutral @UUID[Actor.aifGhost00000000]{Ghost} of the former owner of the house, Fellumbur Delce, haunts the garden at night. The Eomanes murdered him when they moved in. He can be put to rest by sharing the house’s deed, which he hid in the library before he died. (The Eomanes don’t know about it.) Fellumbur promises the deed to those who kill all four Eomanes. Killing them also unseals the house’s exits.

Conclusion. If the characters defeat the Eomanes, they can keep the manor as their Bastion.

Foundry Note

Location of the NPCs:

  1. Trentellar Eomane is in the Arcane Study on the east side of the house next to the library. The spies are in the library and the main hallway near the front door.

  2. Dolandre Eomane and the devil are in the workshop on the west side of the house.

  3. Nysene Eomane is in a junk room on the second floor nearest the NW stairs.

  4. The guard Bilwen is in the barracks on the SW side of the second floor.

  5. Russora Eomane.and the imps are on the third floor in the junk room on the east side of the house.

  6. The ghost, Fellumbur Delce, is in the third-floor garden but hidden.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.I14qRkQan3yd0jm1 caption=false]

The Temple of Transmutation.name: The Temple of Transmutation
The Temple of Transmutation.description:
A Location (Dalelands) Adventure for

Level 7 Characters

Explore the magic of Myth Drannor.

Situation. Letha Salen, a Shadovar survivor of the crash of Thultanthar, has entered the Temple of Transmutation, an ancient magical research institute in Myth Drannor. Using a transmutation chamber in the temple, she’s transforming people and animals into monsters under her command.

Hook. Monster attacks on the edge of Cormanthor suddenly increase. Foresters report the creatures are coming from a large ruin just inside the walls of Myth Drannor. The leader of the local dale, or perhaps the Dales Council, asks the characters to find out what’s going on and stop the monster attacks.

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]

每项2/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]（2 环版本）

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Magic Missile.name: 魔法飞弹
Magic Missile.description:
你创造三枚由魔法力场形成的闪光飞镖，并让每发飞镖袭向施法距离内你能看见的指定生物。每发飞镖对目标造成 1d4 + 1 的力场伤害。所有飞镖将同时袭向目标，而你还可以指定它们击中同一个目标或是分别击中几个目标。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，该法术就会多制造出一支飞镖。

[[2 + @item.level]]{环阶 [[lookup @item.level]] 飞弹}

Fireball.name: 火球术
Fireball.description:
明亮的闪光从你的指间飞驰向施法距离内你指定的一点，并随着一声低吼迸成一片烈焰。目标点周围半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 8d6 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

区域内所有未被着装或携带的可燃物件会开始燃烧。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，其伤害就增加 1d6。

The limb acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect condition in the character sheet's Effects tab to enable each level of Exhaustion. Since the condition can be applied multiple times, the GM must manually manage the level of Exhaustion. There is an active effect available for each level of exhaustion.

Prone.description: 若你的生物体型不超过巨型，则陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .yUKGaYJrEWWVTxZY]] 或 [[/item .mmRock0000000000]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Limited Foresight.name: 有限未来视
Limited Foresight.description:
触发：一名 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的生物对其进行攻击检定。

响应：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 令此次检定具有劣势，且直至其下一回合结束，其对目标发动的攻击检定具有优势。

Expend Use.name: 耗用
Expend Use.condition: 一名独眼巨人哨卫可见的生物对其进行攻击检定。

Mage (Young Blue Dragon).name: Mage (Young Blue Dragon)
Mage (Young Blue Dragon).description:
蓝龙

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.YmY5NC1DqZVHBNX2 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

青年蓝龙

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.ZSbk7sRomEX38jns caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。

Lightning Breath.name: 闪电吐息
Lightning Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]] 尺长、[[lookup @target.template.width activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]] 宽的线状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害。

成功：半伤。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括沿着天花板移动，且不需要为此进行属性检定。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Web Walker.name: 蛛网行者
Web Walker.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在蛛网上移动时无视蛛网造成的移动限制，且与蛛网接触时，[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以知道其他与该蛛网接触生物的位置。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .mmForeleg0000000]] 或 [[/item .mmPoisonBurst000]] 发动共计三次攻击。

Magic of the Spider Queen.name: 蜘蛛女王之魔法
Magic of the Spider Queen.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDarkness00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFaerieFire] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWeb0000000], 无需材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）。

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并在法术持续时间内使魔法性&Reference[darkness]{黑暗}斥以该点为中心半径 15 尺的球状区域。黑暗视觉也无法看穿这这种黑暗，非魔法的光照也无法将其照亮。

或者，你可以将此法术施展于一个未被着装或携带的物件上，使黑暗充斥以该物件为中心的 15 尺光环区域。将该物件用不透明的东西遮掩（比如用碗或头盔盖住）时，会将黑暗隔绝。

如果法术区域与任何二环或更低环阶法术创造的明亮光照或微光光照区域重叠，则这些造光的法术将被解除。

Faerie Fire.name: 妖火
Faerie Fire.description:
施法距离内一处 20 尺立方区域内每个物件都将被蓝色、绿色、或紫色的光所包围（颜色由你指定）。区域内的生物则必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败时也会被光线勾勒出轮廓。受术物件和生物在法术持续时间内发出 10 尺半径的&Reference[dimlight]。

受术生物或物件无法受益于隐形状态，且任何能看见他们的攻击者对其发动的攻击检定具有优势。

Outlined.name: 示廓
Outlined.description:
你的某种颜色的光所包围，在法术持续时间内发出 10 尺半径的&Reference[dimlight]，受术生物或物件无法受益于隐形状态。

任何能看见你的攻击者对你发动的攻击检定具有优势。

Web.name: 蛛网
Web.description:
你在法术范围内指定一点召唤出一大片黏黏的网状物。蛛网覆盖以该点为源点的 20 尺立方区域，并在法术持续时间内维持存在。蛛网范围内视为&Reference[difficultterrain]{困难地形}，并造成 &Reference[lightlyobscured]{轻度遮蔽}。

如果蛛网没有被固定在两个固体中间（例如墙和树）或跨在一片地板、墙壁、天花板中间，则蛛网会自动坍塌，而导致法术在你的下一回合开始时终止。摊在平面上的蛛网深度为 5 尺。

在一个回合中首次进入蛛网，或任何在蛛网中开始其回合的生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，否则陷入&Reference[restrained]状态，直至其离开蛛网或挣脱束缚。

一名因蛛网陷入束缚状态的生物可以用一个动作进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的力量（[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]]{运动}）检定。如果成功，则其不再被束缚。

蛛网是可燃的。任何 5 尺立方区域的蛛网在遇到火焰后会在一轮内燃烧殆尽，并对火焰中开始其回合的生物造成[[/damage 2d4 type=fire]]伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmRam00000000000]]攻击，一次 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] 攻击。其可以将利爪攻击替换为使用 [[/item .mmFireBreath0000]]（若条件允许）。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 此次攻击具有优势，则改为 [[/damage average activity=HN2sfAtHqDMjMLXF]]伤害。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .mmSnakeHair00000]] 攻击，或是发动三次 [[/item .mmPoisonRay00000]] 攻击。

Petrifying Gaze.name: 石化凝视
Petrifying Gaze.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]， [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]] 尺锥状区域内的每名生物。若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在锥形区域内看到自己的倒影，其也必须进行此豁免。

首次失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，目标在下一回合结束时仍处于束缚则重复豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。

再次失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Petrified apply=false] 状态替代其束缚状态。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，你在下一回合结束时仍处于束缚则重复豁免，成功则终止你身上的该效应。

Petrified.name: 石化
Petrified.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Petrified apply=false] 状态替代你的束缚状态。

Guard.name: 警卫
Guard.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{Spear}

Guards

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Zh9j3VBgGnsvq9x4 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Guard

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.IzCvcbHgZ8uPj9TU caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: 你必须拥有盾牌的受训才能从一面盾牌中获得其护甲等级的增益。

Mage.name: 魔法师
Mage.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbafcWand000000]{Wand}

Mages

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.BRPgUa1VGeHBz5BR caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Mage

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.G2fA16d9pkedAKnr caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Wand.name: 魔杖
Wand.description: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{奥术法器}是一种利用宝石或是雕刻来引导奥术魔法的物品。术士、魔契师和法师可以使用这种物品作为法器。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmArcaneBurst000]] 攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor} (included in AC), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 4 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplConeofCold]{Cone of Cold}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}

Misty Step.name: 迷踪步
Misty Step.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]，使用其施法动作的施法属性。

BtkwckQJktc8hRh0.name: 迷踪步
BtkwckQJktc8hRh0.description: 你短暂地被银白的雾气所笼罩，传送到至多 30 尺内一个你能看见且未被占据的空间。

Protective Magic.name: 护身魔法
Protective Magic.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShield0000]（触发条件见这些法术），使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

Counterspell.name: 法术反制
Counterspell.description: 你试图打断一名正在施法的生物。该生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败则法术消散且毫无效果，并且用于施展法术的动作、附赠动作或反应随之浪费。如果那道法术是使用法术位施展的，则法术位并不会被消耗。

activation.condition: 当你看见范围内一名生物施展一道法术时执行

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: 一道看不见的力场制护盾浮现在你身旁，保护着你。在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]的伤害。

activation.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础AC变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。当目标穿上护甲时，此法术将提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Fireball.name: 火球术
Fireball.description:
明亮的闪光从你的指间飞驰向施法距离内你指定的一点，并随着一声低吼迸成一片烈焰。目标点周围半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 8d6 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

区域内所有未被着装或携带的可燃物件会开始燃烧。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，其伤害就增加 1d6。

materials.value: 一颗蝙蝠粪和硫磺搓成的小球

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Cone of Cold.name: 寒冰锥
Cone of Cold.description:
你释放出一团寒冷的空气。以你为源点的 60 尺锥状区域内的所有生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败受到 8d8 寒冷伤害，豁免成功则受到一半伤害。被该法术杀死的生物将成为一尊冰冻塑像直至其被解冻。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比五环高一环，法术伤害就增加 1d8。

Fly.name: 飞行术
Fly.description:
你触碰一个自愿生物。目标在法术持续时间内获得 60 尺的飞行速度且可以悬浮。法术终止时，如果目标仍在空中则随即坠落，除非其能停止坠落。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，就可以额外再指定一名生物作为法术目标。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmRam00000000000]]攻击，一次 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] 攻击。其可以将利爪攻击替换为使用 [[/item .mmFireBreath0000]]（若条件允许）。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 此次攻击具有优势，则改为 [[/damage average activity=HN2sfAtHqDMjMLXF]]伤害。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Ettin.name: 双头巨人
Ettin.description:
装备：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepBattleaxe0]{战斧}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMorningsta]{钉头锤}

双头巨人

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.tCN0ubTwkqFBx3hl caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Battleaxe.name: 战斧
Battleaxe.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若你的体型不超过大型，则你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Morningstar.name: 钉头锤
Morningstar.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标的下一回合结束前，其进行的下次攻击检定具有劣势。

Next Attack: Disadv..name: 下次攻击：劣势。
Next Attack: Disadv..description: 在你的下一回合结束前，你进行的下次攻击检定具有劣势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .2zUJENAN0VZgqxYm]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .5LN8JEIko2tgE2WO]] 攻击。

Ram.name: 冲撞

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Location (Dalelands) Adventure for

Level 7 Characters

Explore the magic of Myth Drannor.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifTempleOfTrans]{Temple Of Transmutation}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.RorPsvnfU5JyX1Lw]{The Temple of Transmutation}

Situation. Letha Salen, a Shadovar survivor of the crash of Thultanthar, has entered the Temple of Transmutation, an ancient magical research institute in Myth Drannor. Using a transmutation chamber in the temple, she’s transforming people and animals into monsters under her command.

Hook. Monster attacks on the edge of Cormanthor suddenly increase. Foresters report the creatures are coming from a large ruin just inside the walls of Myth Drannor. The leader of the local dale, or perhaps the Dales Council, asks the characters to find out what’s going on and stop the monster attacks.

Encounters

The party travels to Myth Drannor. Once the characters reach the site, use the map on the facing page for the Temple of Transmutation. Other levels of the temple are blocked by rubble.

In their exploration, the characters meet Humanoids and Beasts that have been shape-shifted into various creatures. A character who succeeds on a [[/skill 15 skill=nat/ins]] check recognizes a shape-shifted creature as a former Humanoid or Beast, respectively. When any of these transformed creatures die, the shape-shifting effect ends, and they return to their true forms. If transformed back to their original shapes while still alive, Letha’s minions are @UUID[Actor.aifGuard00000000]{Guard}s and Letha is a @UUID[Actor.aifMage000000000]{Mage}.

This adventure includes the encounters on the following pages.

Transformed Creatures

All Tokens in the Scene have been placed as their "true" form and then transformed into their changed form. To revert them to their original form:

  1. Open their character sheet by double clicking on their Token.

  2. Click on the kebab menu ( ) in the top-right of their sheet.

  3. Click on the  Restore Transformation option.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.Kn9FqbEN5zGpIQ84 caption=false]

Baxton Cottage.name: Baxton Cottage
Baxton Cottage.text: A rustic cottage is under attack by a @UUID[Actor.aifChuul00000000]{Chuul}, an @UUID[Actor.aifEttin00000000]{Ettin}, a @UUID[Actor.aifFlameskull000]{Flameskull}, and a @UUID[Actor.aifHelmedHorror0]{Helmed Horror}, minions of Letha Salen who have been shape-shifted. A halfling named Beauregard Baxton is trapped inside with his four family members (Small, Neutral Good @UUID[Actor.aifCommoner00000]{Commoners}). When one of the creatures is defeated, the rest flee, returning to area 9 to tell Letha about the party. Once rescued, Beauregard welcomes the party into his home. He has lived peacefully in the shadow of the temple for decades, but recently strange monsters have emerged from it and kidnapped his brother Brandon. The party can use his home as a place to rest as they investigate.

Crossroads.name: Crossroads
Crossroads.text: A goat shape-shifted into a @UUID[Actor.aifTyrannosaurus]{Tyrannosaurus Rex} grazes peacefully. If threatened, it flees.

Lookout.name: Lookout
Lookout.text: Two minions of Letha Salen, now transformed into a @UUID[Actor.aifTroll00000000]{Troll} and an @UUID[Actor.aifUmberHulk0000]{Umber Hulk}, keep watch from this hilltop building, looking for potential victims to be transformed.

Crash Wreckage.name: Crash Wreckage
Crash Wreckage.text: Pieces of Thultanthar fell on the temple here, crushing many inhabitants. When the party draws close, six of the corpses animate as @UUID[Actor.aifWight00000000]{Wights}. Once awoken, the wights fight any living creatures they see.

Hideout.name: Hideout
Hideout.text: Beauregard Baxton’s brother Brandon has been transformed into a @UUID[Actor.aifYeti000000000]{Yeti}. He escaped and hid here, unsure what to do. He pretends to be a fierce creature if discovered but responds positively if the characters try to talk to him. Brandon doesn’t remember much from before his transformation, but he’s eager to find his family and protect them.

Ruins.name: Ruins
Ruins.text: A human forester named Wila Peat was captured by Letha and turned into a @UUID[Actor.mmCyclopsSentry0]{Cyclops Sentry}. Letha told Wila to go find more subjects for transmutation, and Wila agreed out of fear. Wila is Indifferent to the characters. As an &Reference[Influence] action, a creature can try to convince her to turn against Letha and make a [[/skill 15 per]] check, earning Wila’s support on a successful check. A character who promises to turn Wila back into a human has Advantage on this check.

Guard Room.name: 警卫室
Guard Room.text: Three of Letha’s followers, now transformed into a @UUID[Actor.aifChimera000000]{Chimera}, a @UUID[Actor.aifDrider0000000]{Drider}, and a @UUID[Actor.aifMedusa0000000]{Medusa} respectively, guard the temple and await Letha’s orders.

Transmutation Chamber.name: Transmutation Chamber
Transmutation Chamber.text:
Once a day, a character outside the transmutation chamber can take the &Reference[Magic] action to activate it and shape-shift a Humanoid or Beast inside the chamber into a creature of another type. (On the day the party arrives, the chamber hasn’t been used.) The new form is chosen by the DM. The target’s game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen creature, but the target retains its alignment and personality.

The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the anatomy of its new form; if the new form can’t speak, for example, the target can’t speak either and can’t use Verbal components.

When the target shape-shifts, its equipment drops to the ground.

Casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse} spell on a creature shape-shifted this way restores it to its original form. The effect also ends if the creature dies. Once a creature has been affected by the transmutation chamber, the chamber doesn’t work on it again.

Letha's Lair.name: Letha's Lair
Letha's Lair.text: Letha has transformed herself into a @UUID[Actor.aifYoungBlueDrag]{Young Blue Dragon}. If she’s not using the transmutation chamber on another victim, she’s here, trying to figure out how to better control the chamber or plotting her takeover of the Dalelands.

Fey Annex.name: Fey Annex
Fey Annex.text: Only Fey creatures can pass through the archway entrance to this part of the temple. A @UUID[Actor.aifDireWorg00000]{Dire Worg}, preserved in magical suspended animation since the glory days of Myth Drannor, sleeps in the chamber. It awakens if touched or if it takes damage.

The Dallabad Curse.name: The Dallabad Curse
The Dallabad Curse.description:
A Location (Calimshan) Adventure for

Level 5 Characters

Drive off the ghost that haunts an oasis.

Situation. A mind flayer named Yharaskrik has survived a sojourn on the Astral Plane and returned to the Dallabad Oasis, not far from Calimport.

Hook. Caravans have used Dallabad safely for decades. But in recent months, anyone stopping there has been attacked by Undead and other strange creatures. A Kochar council hires the characters to make Dallabad Oasis safe again.

Paralyzing Tentacles.name: 麻痹触须
Paralyzing Tentacles.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended]]。如果目标生物体型[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=MEc8vUTPipCkqjyq]] ，目标将被触须怪两只触手之一擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false]状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。此外，目标还将承受以下效应：

Poisoned & Paralyzed.name: 中毒并麻痹

Tentacles.name: 触须
Tentacles.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，则其被全部四条触须擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你的生物体型不超过中型，则陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 12， [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。且寇涛驱策者无法再次发动钳杖攻击，直至擒抱结束。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmRottingFist000]] 攻击，并使用 [[/item .mmDreadfulGlare0]]。

Rotting Fist.name: 腐朽拳击
Rotting Fist.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

Cursed.name: 诅咒
Cursed.description: 若你为生物，则你被诅咒。受诅咒期间，你无法恢复生命值，也无法在完成长休时恢复生命值上限，并且诅咒每持续 24 小时，你生命值上限降低 [[/r 3d6#减少最大生命值]]{10 (3d6)}。若你因此攻击生命值降至 0，则你立即死亡并化为尘土。

Dreadful Glare.name: 恐怖怒视
Dreadful Glare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Dreadful Glare for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直到木乃伊的下一回合结束。
