Fire Aura.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 回合结束时位于源自 [[lookup @name lowcase]] [[lookup @target.template.size activity=15VgJKVXwYBOFSqJ]] 尺光环内的所有生物受到 [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmFlameTrident00]] 攻击。

Flame Trident.name: 烈焰三叉戟
Flame Trident.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。命中或失手：三叉戟会在被用于一次远程攻击后立即魔法性地回到 [[lookup @name lowercase]]手中。

Inferno Blast.name: 炎狱爆裂
Inferno Blast.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]，以 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] 尺内[[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见的一点为中心，半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] 尺的球状区域内的所有生物。

失败： [[/damage average activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]伤害，且目标开始燃烧，目标在其回合开始时受到 [[/damage average activity=cuIDOQ2o3dMRhqzd]]伤害，而非普通的燃烧伤害。每当目标承受此燃烧伤害，目标获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] 等级。

成功：仅半伤。

Foundry Note

该特性提供一项激活效应，会改变目标物件。由于效应可多次施加，所以每次目标在初始等级后再次获得力竭等级时，都得从本物件的“效应”选项卡中将效应拖到目标物件卡上。

Exhaustion.name: 力竭
Exhaustion.description: 每当你承受炎狱爆裂的燃烧伤害，你获得 1 级 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Blazing Movement.name: 炽烈移动
Blazing Movement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动至多等于其速度的距离且不会引发&Reference[OpportunityAttacks]。在[[lookup @name lowercase]]移动过程中，火焰会充斥于源自 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=MUbX28KmoDF9sC5b]] 尺光环区域内。当光环进入一个生物所处空间时，该生物受到 [[/damage average]]伤害。每名生物每回合仅受一次此伤害。

affects.special: 每回合仅受到一次该伤害

Draconic Origin.name: 龙族起源
Draconic Origin.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 和某种龙类的联系令其与下列伤害类型中的一种相关联（由DM选择）：强酸、寒冷、火焰、闪电、毒素。这一选择会影响数据卡的其他部分。

Foundry Note

该特性在角色卡的“效应”选项卡中提供了一个激活效应，用于管理伤害抗性。所列出的抗性需要手动启用/禁用。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] 攻击。

Dragon's Breath.name: 龙息术
Dragon's Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害，类型为龙族起源特质所选的伤害类型。

成功：半伤。

Leap.name: 跳跃
Leap.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] 跳跃至多 [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] 尺。

邪教徒

Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmPactAxe0000000]] 攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowcase]]施展以下一道法术，使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]，法术攻击命中 +7）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScorchingR]（5 环版本），@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]

Hellish Rebuke.name: 炼狱叱喝
Hellish Rebuke.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHellishReb]（触发条件见该法术），使用其施法动作的施法属性。

JKj2mFhjY5PxpL16.name: 炼狱叱喝
JKj2mFhjY5PxpL16.description:
伤害你的生物立刻被绿色的烈焰席卷。该生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 2d10 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则受到半数伤害。

升环施法： 使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

activation.condition: 当你受到来自 60 尺内你可见生物的伤害时执行

Scorching Ray.name: 灼热射线
Scorching Ray.description:
你射出三道火焰的射线。你可以将其射向施法距离内的一个或多个目标。每道射线需要你分别进行一次远程法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 2d6 点火焰伤害。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，使用的法术位每比二环高一环，你就能多创造出一道射线。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Fireball.name: 火球术
Fireball.description:
明亮的闪光从你的指间飞驰向施法距离内你指定的一点，并随着一声低吼迸成一片烈焰。目标点周围半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 8d6 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

区域内所有未被着装或携带的可燃物件会开始燃烧。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，其伤害就增加 1d6。

materials.value: 一颗蝙蝠粪和硫磺搓成的小球

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Deity (Torm) Adventure for

Level 13 Characters

Recover a sword from a dragon’s lair.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifHeartOfFireDr]{Heart of Fire}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.m8JoQnWaVSfRyEMx]{Heart of Fire}

Situation. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.items.Item.aifHolyAvenger00]{Chalsembyr’s Heart}, a sentient @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgHolyAvenger00]{Holy Avenger} Greatsword sacred to Torm, has been located in the hoard of Khrangyrdis, an @UUID[Actor.aifAdultRedDrago]{Adult Red Dragon} and worshiper of Tiamat. Khran, as the dragon is often called, lairs near Ormpur. Complicating matters, Khran wears an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgAmuletOfProof]{Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location}. Her lair is protected by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplForbiddanc]{Forbiddance} spell that damages Celestials.

Hook. Zimrir Chay (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifArchpriest000]{Archpriest}), a human devoted to Torm, asks the characters to acquire the sword from Khran. While the party could negotiate, he prefers that the dragon be destroyed, freeing the region from her sway. If the characters agree to slay the creature, Zimrir provides each character with a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgSupremePotion]{Potion of Healing} (supreme) and a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.items.Item.aifPotionOfResis]{Potion of Fire Resistance}.

Encounters

The adventure consists of these encounters.

Saffron Slayers. The people of Ormpur know the location of Khran’s lair, east across the Shaar in the Dun Hills. But the dragon has countless well-paid eyes and ears in the city, so the party’s fame and purpose quickly spread. Elite forces of a gang in Khran’s employ—a @UUID[Actor.aifBanditCrimeLo]{Bandit Crime Lord}, a @UUID[Actor.aifSpyMaster0000]{Spy Master}, and two @UUID[Actor.aifAssassin00000]{Assassins}—ambush the characters and urge them to leave Ormpur for good.

Burning Shaar. More of Khran’s allies hear of the party and their quest, pursuing them into the Shaar and then the Dun Hills as the characters approach the lair. The elf Naedrin (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifCultistHierop]{Cultist Hierophant}) flies in on the back of Aphusso, a @UUID[Actor.aifYoungRedDrago]{Young Red Dragon}. Naedrin talks first, using his magic to turn would-be dragonslayers from their path. Failing that, Naedrin calls forth two @UUID[Actor.aifFireElemental]{Fire Elementals} and initiates combat. If the battle takes place in the Shaar, an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.actors.Actor.dmgInferno000000]{inferno} (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.lVkdQivhFHqVmxg7#inferno]{chapter 3} of the Dungeon Master’s Guide) results.

Ash Lands. Khran greets the party from a hilltop the party must pass. If battle ensues, she leaves as soon as she can, with a parting invitation to join her later for a fine meal.

Khrangyrdis’s Lair. Use the @UUID[Scene.aifHeartOfFireDr]{Dragon Lair} map in appendix B of the Dungeon Master’s Guide. This structure is an old temple to Tiamat, destroyed during the Spellplague. Khran prefers level 3, but she doesn’t want her servants slain and fights intruders when she becomes aware of them. Khran’s lair is further detailed below:

Level 1. Bizarre yet elegant formations of sharp, melted stone make up the scorched ruins that top Khran’s hill. An unscathed shrine to Tiamat remains in the northeastern corner, outside two stone doors, each with a @UUID[Actor.aifSalamander000]{Salamander} guard. These guards allow visitors to enter the site. Beyond the doors, a @UUID[Actor.aifSalamanderInf]{Salamander Inferno Master} tends an ancient pool of molten stone for Khran’s enjoyment. Once the party is inside, the master and guards ambush them.

Level 2. Walls and pillars carved with images extolling the glory of the Dragon Queen make up this firelit level. Four red @UUID[Actor.aifHalfdragon000]{Half-Dragons} live and work here, guided by a @UUID[Actor.aifFiendCultist0]{Fiend Cultist}. These loyal minions fight intruders.

Level 3. Khran dwells and stores her hoard, including @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.items.Item.aifHolyAvenger00]{Chalsembyr’s Heart}, here.

Conclusion. Tormtars celebrate characters who return Chalsembyr’s Heart to the House of the Hand. Priests offer the sword to a character who serves Torm and is willing to search for the lost realm of Chalsembyr, which Torm ruled as a mortal.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifArtHandouts00.JournalEntryPage.AnOSlwqGPrUk91RD caption=false]

The Flying Fortress.name: The Flying Fortress
The Flying Fortress.description:
A Faction (Purple Dragon Knights) Adventure for

Level 11 Characters

Intercept the Cult of the Dragon in an aerial battle.

Situation. Cultists of the Dragon have taken control of a cloud giant’s flying castle.

Hook. Cormyr’s queen asks the characters to lead the attack on this flying menace and offers Wyvern mounts to those who need one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack and one [[/item .mmSting000000000]] attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the wyvern's next turn.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .vTZW4dSRGXTDWvRd]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmShieldBash0000]].

Shield Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield Bash.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] [[lookup @range.units activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]]. that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds [[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]] to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Use.name: Use
Use.condition: hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Acid Breath.name: Acid Breath

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Wand.name: Wand
Wand.description: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes four [[/item .mmArcaneBurst000]] attacks.

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

lSbRnSVRWsTQoh2w.name: Misty Step
lSbRnSVRWsTQoh2w.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Protective Magic.name: Protective Magic
Protective Magic.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

activation.condition: when you see a creature within range casting a spell with Verbal, Somatic, or Material components

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

activation.condition: when you are hit by an attack roll or targeted by the Magic Missile spell

Imperceptible Barrier.name: Imperceptible Barrier
Imperceptible Barrier.description: Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from Magic Missile.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor} (included in AC), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt} (level 7 version)

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplConeofCold]{Cone of Cold} (level 9 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMindBlank0]{Mind Blank} (cast before combat), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTeleport00]{Teleport}

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Detect Thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don't read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target's mind right now. If the target doesn't know any languages and isn't telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target's mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target's reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target's mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
Prestidigitation.description:
You create a magical effect within range. Choose the effect from the options below. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time.

Sensory Effect. You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.

Fire Play. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

Clean or Soil. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.

Minor Sensation. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.

Magic Mark. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.

Minor Creation. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It lasts until the end of your next turn. A trinket can deal no damage and has no monetary worth.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target gains a Fly Speed of 60 feet and can hover. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft unless it can stop the fall.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

materials.value: a bit of fur and a crystal rod

Cone of Cold.name: Cone of Cold
Cone of Cold.description:
You unleash a blast of cold air. Each creature in a 60-foot Cone originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Cold damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 5.

materials.value: a small crystal or glass cone

Mind Blank.name: Mind Blank
Mind Blank.description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch has Immunity to Psychic damage and the Charmed condition. The target is also unaffected by anything that would sense its emotions or alignment, read its thoughts, or magically detect its location, and no spell—not even @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish}—can gather information about the target, observe it remotely, or control its mind.

Scrying.name: Scrying
Scrying.description:
You can see and hear a creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw, which is modified (see the tables below) by how well you know the target and the sort of physical connection you have to it. The target doesn't know what it is making the save against, only that it feels uneasy.

Your Knowledge of the Target Is …Save Modifier
Secondhand (heard of the target)+5
Firsthand (met the target)+0
Extensive (know the target well)−5
You Have the Target's …Save Modifier
Picture or other likeness−2
Garment or other possession−4
Body part, lock of hair, or bit of nail−10

On a successful save, the target isn't affected, and you can't use this spell on it again for 24 hours.

On a failed save, the spell creates an Invisible, intangible sensor within 10 feet of the target. You can see and hear through the sensor as if you were there. The sensor moves with the target, remaining within 10 feet of it for the duration. If something can see the sensor, it appears as a luminous orb about the size of your fist.

Instead of targeting a creature, you can target a location you have seen. When you do so, the sensor appears at that location and doesn't move.

materials.value: a focus worth 1,000+ GP, such as a crystal ball, mirror, or water-filled font

affects.special: creature on same plane of existence or a location you have seen
at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description:
This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures that you can see within range, or a single object that you can see within range, to a destination you select. If you target an object, it must be Large or smaller, and it can't be held or carried by an unwilling creature.

The destination you choose must be known to you, and it must be on the same plane of existence as you. Your familiarity with the destination determines whether you arrive there successfully. The DM rolls [[/gmr 1d100]] and consults the Teleportation Outcome table and the explanations after it.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables24.RollTable.phbsplTeleportMi]{Teleportation Outcome}
FamiliarityMishapSimilar AreaOff TargetOn Target
Permanent circle———01–00
Linked object———01–00
Very familiar01–0506–1314–2425–00
Seen casually01–3334–4344–5354–00
Viewed once or described01–4344–5354–7374–00
False destination01–5051–00——

Familiarity. Here are the meanings of the terms in the table's Familiarity column:

  • "Permanent circle" means a permanent teleportation circle whose sigil sequence you know.
  • "Linked object" means you possess an object taken from the desired destination within the last six months, such as a book from a wizard's library.
  • "Very familiar" is a place you have visited often, a place you have carefully studied, or a place you can see when you cast the spell.
  • "Seen casually" is a place you have seen more than once but with which you aren't very familiar.
  • "Viewed once or described" is a place you have seen once, possibly using magic, or a place you know through someone else's description, perhaps from a map.
  • "False destination" is a place that doesn't exist. Perhaps you tried to scry an enemy's sanctum but instead viewed an illusion, or you are attempting to teleport to a location that no longer exists.

Mishap. The spell's unpredictable magic results in a difficult journey. Each teleporting creature (or the target object) takes [[/damage 3d10 type=force]] damage, and the DM rerolls on the table to see where you wind up (multiple mishaps can occur, dealing damage each time).

Similar Area. You and your group (or the target object) appear in a different area that's visually or thematically similar to the target area. You appear in the closest similar place. If you are heading for your home laboratory, for example, you might appear in another person's laboratory in the same city.

Off Target. You and your group (or the target object) appear [[/r 2d12]] miles away from the destination in a random direction. Roll [[/r 1d8]] for the direction: 1, east; 2, southeast; 3, south; 4, southwest; 5, west; 6, northwest; 7, north; or 8, northeast.

On Target. You and your group (or the target object) appear where you intended.

affects.special: you and up to eight creatures or one object

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Draconic Origin.name: Draconic Origin
Draconic Origin.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is related to a type of dragon associated with one of the following damage types (DM's choice): Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. This choice affects other aspects of the stat block.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab. The resistances outlined will need to be manually enabled/disabled.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] attacks.

Dragon's Breath.name: Dragon's Breath
Dragon's Breath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage of the type chosen for the Draconic Origin trait.

Success: Half damage.

Leap.name: Leap
Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Shadow Stealth.name: Shadow Stealth
Shadow Stealth.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

Shadow Breath.name: Shadow Breath
Shadow Breath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]]

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies, and a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.aifShadow0000000]{Shadow} rises from its corpse. The shadow is under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s control and shares the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Initiative count but acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

Veil of Shadow.name: Veil of Shadow
Veil of Shadow.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shadow Stealth, and [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]] of its choice that it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]] [[lookup @range.units activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]]. of it takes [[/damage average]] damage. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Living Shadow.name: Living Shadow
Living Shadow.description:
While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab. The resistances outlined will need to be manually enabled/disabled.

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Faction (Purple Dragon Knights) Adventure for

Level 11 Characters

Intercept the Cult of the Dragon in an aerial battle.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifFlyingFortres]{Flying Fortress}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.nMhyUGIIjWcyDOmj]{The Flying Fortress}

Situation. Cultists of the Dragon have taken control of a cloud giant’s flying castle.

Hook. Cormyr’s queen asks the characters to lead the attack on this flying menace and offers @UUID[Actor.aifWyvern0000000]{Wyvern} mounts to those who need one.

Encounters

Most of this adventure takes place in the sky.

Flying toward Doom. The flying fortress’s trail of carnage is easy to track. As the characters approach, a patrol of four cult @UUID[Actor.aifGladiator0000]{Gladiators} riding @UUID[Actor.aifWyvern0000000]{Wyverns} intercepts them. One of the gladiators carries a map showing the fortress with a red heart-shaped symbol inside the central hill.

Veil of Storms. The fortress is protected by an arcane storm. When they approach the fortress, characters and mounts make a [[/save 15 dex]] saving throw, taking [[/damage 4d10 type=bludgeoning average]] damage and [[/damage 6d6 type=lightning average]] damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Fight in the Air. Use the Flying Fortress map below. Four @UUID[Actor.aifYoungBlackDra]{Young Black Dragons} protect the fortress by air. The fortress includes the following features:

Caves. Two caves provide entry to the fortress’s heart (see below).

Gatehouses. A Huge iron portcullis blocks entry and exit of each gatehouse.

Keep. The fortress is steered by an evil @UUID[Actor.aifArchmage00000]{Archmage} in the keep. The keep’s walls are patrolled by five @UUID[Actor.aifHalfdragon000]{Half-Dragons}. If the archmage is defeated, the fortress slows and descends, reaching the ground safely in 10 minutes.

Maze. A cluster of buildings provides an obstacle course for flying characters. Use the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.7zmKJrfgd9aTtzFp]{chase rules} in chapter 3 of the Dungeon Master’s Guide to adjudicate characters in the maze.

Towers. Cult archers crowd each tower. When an enemy of the cult moves within 40 feet of a tower for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, it must succeed on a [[/save 13 dex]] saving throw or take [[/damage 4d6 piercing]] damage. A creature makes this save only once per turn. If a character lands on or attacks a tower, archers there abandon their post.

Tunnel. The enclosed tunnel can be entered only through gatehouses at either end. It makes an excellent place for melee combat with flying foes.

The Heart. Characters passing through the caves enter a vast, dark cavern housing the magical beating heart of the fortress. The @UUID[Actor.aifFortressHeart]{heart} (AC 13, HP 5) is protected by a @UUID[Actor.aifShadowDragon0]{Shadow Dragon} named Gloamstalker. If the heart is destroyed, the castle plummets from the sky, crashing in 1 minute.

Conclusion. When the archmage is defeated or the heart destroyed, the surviving cultists flee. The queen gives the characters land and noble titles in a grand ceremony. Each character’s Renown Score with the Purple Dragon Knights increases by 1.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.rWmtNQP7sSUrONAn caption=false]

The Weeping Goddess.name: The Weeping Goddess
The Weeping Goddess.description:
A Deity (Shar) Adventure for

Level 2 Characters

Discover a hidden shrine to Shar.

Situation. During a recent new moon, fisherfolk in Leilon heard sobbing on Idol Island, and Valdi Estapaar, the local fishery boss, took a small group there. She discovered a weeping statue alongside a shrine. Mist then covered the isle, and Valdi and her helpers retreated. Since then, grieving people in Leilon have forgotten much of their past while also becoming darker of mood.

Hook. Merrygold Brightshine, priest of Leilon’s Lathander shrine, suspects Shar’s involvement. Merrygold and Valdi ask the characters to investigate the weeping statue. Valdi provides a Rowboat (see the Player’s Handbook), and Merrygold provides four Potions of Healing.

Swarm.name: 集群
Swarm.description: 蠕行之爪集群可以进驻另一生物身处的空间，反之亦然。而且蠕行之爪集群可以通过任何足够一只微型生物通过的通道。蠕行之爪集群不能恢复生命值也不能获得临时生命值。

Beaks.name: 喙啄
Beaks.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若[[lookup @activation.condition activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]]则改为[[/damage average activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]]。

Cacophony.name: 不谐和音
Cacophony.description:
感知豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=pyvvXqoxJsjkkP38]]，单一位于[[lookup @name lowcase]]空间内的生物。

失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Deafened apply=false] 状态，直至 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 下一回合开始。耳聋期间，目标进行的属性检定和攻击检定均具有劣势。

Deafened and Disadvantaged.name: 耳聋并劣势
Deafened and Disadvantaged.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Deafened apply=false] 状态，直至渡鸦集群下一回合开始。期间你进行的属性检定和攻击检定均具有劣势。

Swarm of Stirges.name: 蚊蝠集群
Swarm of Stirges.description:
蚊蝠

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.XvhPdtq14MUqgYVO caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

蚊蝠集群

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.3NFw8o4jC82NCkx7 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Swarm.name: 集群
Swarm.description: 蠕行之爪集群可以进驻另一生物身处的空间，反之亦然。而且蠕行之爪集群可以通过任何足够一只微型生物通过的通道。蠕行之爪集群不能恢复生命值也不能获得临时生命值。

Swarm of Proboscises.name: 喙群
Swarm of Proboscises.description: [[/attack extended activity=RkmvpUI0spboBnYE]]。[[/damage average extended activity=RkmvpUI0spboBnYE]]，若[[lookup @activation.condition activity=Mgyp5Wa3cgoXX3N4]]则改为 [[/damage average activity=Mgyp5Wa3cgoXX3N4]]伤害。若目标生物体型不超过中型且位于[[lookup @name lowcase]]所在空间，则目标陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.acr.passive]]）。目标在其回合结束时受到 [[/damage average activity=n1k1Xq0kdB79VrOI]] 伤害，直至擒抱结束。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你的生物体型不超过中型且位于蚊蝠集群所在空间，则你陷入&Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 13，[[/check ability=dex skill=acr format=long]]）。

Amorphous.name: 无定形
Amorphous.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Sunlight Weakness.name: 日光弱点
Sunlight Weakness.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]]身处阳光下，其进行的D20检定具有劣势。

Draining Swipe.name: 汲命击
Draining Swipe.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target's Strength score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.aifShadow0000000]{Shadow} rises from the corpse [[/r 1d4]] hours later.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) to modify the target's Strength Score. When the target roll's their d4 to determine the loss, you can apply the respective AE to the target's sheet.

attack.chatFlavor: 命中：目标的力量值降低

Hit: STR Score -1.name: 命中：力量值降低 1 点

Hit: STR Score -2.name: 命中：力量值降低 2 点

Hit: STR Score -3.name: 命中：力量值降低 3 点

Hit: STR Score -4.name: 命中：力量值降低 4 点

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处微光光照或黑暗，其执行 &Reference[Hide] 动作。

Mimicry.name: 拟声
Mimicry.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以模仿其听过的任何声音，包括声线。听到该声音的生物可以成功通过一次 [[/check format=long]]检定来发现其是模仿。

Shadow Blade.name: 影之刃
Shadow Blade.description: 近战或远程攻击检定：[[/attack]]，触及 [[lookup @item.range.reach]] 尺或射程 [[lookup @item.range.value]] 尺。命中： [[/damage average]] 伤害。命中或失手：影之刃会在被用于一次远程攻击后立即魔法性地回到 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 手中。

Eldritch Lantern.name: 魔能提灯
Eldritch Lantern.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]，并使用智力作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]）。

Faerie Fire.name: 妖火
Faerie Fire.description:
施法距离内一处 20 尺立方区域内每个物件都将被蓝色、绿色、或紫色的光所包围（颜色由你指定）。区域内的生物则必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败时也会被光线勾勒出轮廓。受术物件和生物在法术持续时间内发出 10 尺半径的&Reference[dimlight]。

受术生物或物件无法受益于隐形状态，且任何能看见他们的攻击者对其发动的攻击检定具有优势。

Outlined.name: 示廓
Outlined.description:
你的某种颜色的光所包围，在法术持续时间内发出 10 尺半径的&Reference[dimlight]，受术生物或物件无法受益于隐形状态。

任何能看见你的攻击者对你发动的攻击检定具有优势。

Cultist Fanatic.name: 邪教狂信者
Cultist Fanatic.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol (Varies)}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}

Cultists

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.VICfYukXoYkWJ1yn caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Cultist Fanatic

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.DHw4tAz06WzLz07b caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]，法术攻击命中 +4）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{光亮术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{奇术}

2/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000]{命令术}

1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]{定身人类}

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器
Spiritual Weapon.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]，使用其施法动作的施法属性。

z817Et9IPt6qHawH.name: 灵体武器
z817Et9IPt6qHawH.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Lacedon Ghoul.name: 食尸水鬼
Lacedon Ghoul.description:
食尸鬼

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.DN8RNyJ7NsoA7TnO caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

食尸水鬼

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.DIgn5Jug9peaUxrv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmIcyBite0000000]] 攻击。

Icy Bite.name: 阴寒啃咬
Icy Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]， 且目标速度降低 5 尺直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

Speed: -5 ft..name: 速度降低 5 尺
Speed: -5 ft..description: 目标速度降低 5 尺直至攻击生物的下一回合开始。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标非亡灵且非精灵，其承受以下效应。

体质豁免检定： DC[[lookup @save.dc.value activity=fDMRlni8W3d3QoOD]]。

失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，直至其下一回合结束。

affects.special: that isn’t an Undead or elf

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，直至下一回合结束。

Watery Rush.name: 蹿腾水中
Watery Rush.description: 若身处水中， [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动至多等于其游泳速度一半的距离，且不会引发&Reference[Opportunity Attacks]{借机攻击}。

Expend Use.name: 耗用
Expend Use.condition: 移动至多等于其游泳速度一半的距离

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .hRwqUlEyM9TjOmHy]] 或 [[/item .mmRadiantFlame00]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritGuar]{Spirit Guardians}

Divine Aid.name: 至圣援护
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
你祝福施法范围内至多 3 个生物。在法术终止前，每当受术目标进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就能多指定一个生物。

Blessed.name: 祝福
Blessed.description: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Healing Word.name: 治愈真言
Healing Word.description:
你指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物并恢复其生命值，恢复量等于 2d4 + 你的施法属性调整值。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d4 点。

Lesser Restoration.name: 次等复原术
Lesser Restoration.description: 你触碰一个生物，并终止正影响它的一种状态：&Reference[blinded]、&Reference[deafened]、&Reference[paralyzed] 或 &Reference[poisoned]。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器
Spiritual Weapon.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Deity (Shar) Adventure for

Level 2 Characters

Discover a hidden shrine to Shar.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifShrineOfLatha]{Shrine Of Lathander}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.nahoqN4H77YzsphI]{The Weeping Goddess}

Situation. During a recent new moon, fisherfolk in Leilon heard sobbing on Idol Island, and Valdi Estapaar, the local fishery boss, took a small group there. She discovered a weeping statue alongside a shrine. Mist then covered the isle, and Valdi and her helpers retreated. Since then, grieving people in Leilon have forgotten much of their past while also becoming darker of mood.

Hook. Merrygold Brightshine, priest of Leilon’s Lathander shrine, suspects Shar’s involvement. Merrygold and Valdi ask the characters to investigate the weeping statue. Valdi provides a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobRowboat000]{Rowboat} (see the Player’s Handbook), and Merrygold provides four @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagPotionofHea]{Potions of Healing}.

Encounters

The adventure consists of these encounters.

Raven Run. As characters leave for Idol Island, they are followed by a large flock of ravens, animals sacred to Shar. Eventually, the birds swoop down and initiate combat. They include three @UUID[Actor.aifSwarmOfRavens]{Swarms of Ravens} and a fourth group infused with shadow magic (@UUID[Actor.aifSwarmOfStirge]{Swarm of Stirges}).

Gloom Mist. Mist around Idol Island dampens nonmagical lights and cantrips so they create only &Reference[Dim Light]. Five sobbing @UUID[Actor.aifShadow0000000]{Shadows} ambush the characters as the group nears the shore.

Weeping Goddess. As the party approaches a rough statue fronting an old shrine, sounds of weeping emanate from it. If the group lingers, the crying ceases, and three @UUID[Actor.aifKenku00000000]{Kenku} and a @UUID[Actor.aifCultistFanati]{Cultist Fanatic} loyal to Shar, who were making the weeping noises, emerge from the shrine and order the characters to leave or die.

Entryways. This area has two entrances to the sanctum. A hole opens in the shrine’s southern wall, leading to a flooded tunnel. The shrine’s altar conceals a standard secret door ([[/skill perception 15]] to detect), leading to a dry secret passage.

Flooded Tunnel. Darkness and cloudy water fill this tunnel. Two @UUID[Actor.aifLacedonGhoul0]{Lacedon Ghouls} have been attracted to the deathly magic here.

Sanctum. Within this sanctuary, which also serves as a barrack, an obsidian pillar glows with violet light. Irric (Medium, Neutral Evil @UUID[Actor.aifPriest0000000]{Priest}) dwells here along with three @UUID[Actor.aifKenku00000000]{Kenku}. Irric uses the pillar to draw sorrow from townsfolk to offer to Shar, hoping she’ll break the curse on his kenku followers. During battle, stolen grief manifests as a weeping @UUID[Actor.aifShadow0000000]{Shadow}.

Conclusion. On Irric’s defeat, Shar withdraws her power from the pillar, which returns to normal but blackened stone. The shadows and gloomy mist on Idol Island vanish, as do the unnaturally aggressive ravens. Townsfolk return to normal, and Merrygold and Valdi are grateful.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.98UdhSjeUGwJYWmk caption=false]

Clockwork Memories.name: Clockwork Memories
Clockwork Memories.description:
A Location (Baldur's Gate) Adventure for

Level 7 Characters

Protect an inventor from the Guild.

Situation. A Gondian inventor named Flurn Eightspoke has unlocked a way to preserve a person’s memories in a clockwork brain. He doesn’t realize his test subject was a Guild informant, and now the Guild wants both Flurn and his mechanical creation destroyed.

Hook. A smith offers the characters a discount in exchange for checking on his former boss, the inventor Flurn Eightspoke, at his Heapside workshop. The smith has heard rumors that Flurn ran afoul of the Guild but can’t imagine what the good-natured inventor could have done to deserve this attention. Alternatively, mechanically oriented characters hear that Flurn has completed a great invention and stop by to check it out.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .hRwqUlEyM9TjOmHy]] 或 [[/item .mmRadiantFlame00]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritGuar]{Spirit Guardians}

Divine Aid.name: 至圣援护
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
你祝福施法范围内至多 3 个生物。在法术终止前，每当受术目标进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就能多指定一个生物。

Blessed.name: 祝福
Blessed.description: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Healing Word.name: 治愈真言
Healing Word.description:
你指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物并恢复其生命值，恢复量等于 2d4 + 你的施法属性调整值。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d4 点。

Lesser Restoration.name: 次等复原术
Lesser Restoration.description: 你触碰一个生物，并终止正影响它的一种状态：&Reference[blinded]、&Reference[deafened]、&Reference[paralyzed] 或 &Reference[poisoned]。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器
Spiritual Weapon.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Commoner.name: 平民
Commoner.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepClub000000]{Club}

Commoner

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.M7bvUVFcncRjraJP caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Training.name: 技艺受训
Training.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 具有某项技能熟练（由DM选择），且在进行使用该技能的属性检定时具有优势。

Nimblewright Guard.name: Nimblewright Guard
Nimblewright Guard.description:
Cunningly Crafted Clockwork Sentinels

Nimblewrights are fabricated from durable wood and animated by magic and clockwork gears. Some nimblewrights bear metal plates to protect their cogs and springs, while others have their workings exposed. No mere automatons, nimblewrights can form rudimentary plans and adapt their routines to account for dangers.

Nimblewrights are surprisingly dexterous for creations made of animated wood and metal. A nimblewright walks with a flowing grace and fights with whirling pirouettes.

Nimblewrights can serve as interesting background flavor in Calimshan or other areas where they are common. Roll or choose a result from the Nimblewright Tasks table as inspiration for what a nimblewright guard or nimblewright hulk might be doing in a busy public place.

@embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.tables.RollTable.aifNimblewrightT rollable resultLabel="The Nimblewright Is …"]

Nimblewright Guard

Watchful sentries that patrol important sites, nimblewright guards serve as loyal soldiers or work as vigilant bodyguards.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The nimblewright makes three attacks, using [[/item Scimitar]] or [[/item Clockwork Crossbow]] in any combination.

Evasion.name: 反射闪避
Evasion.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 受到一个允许其进行敏捷豁免来只承受一半伤害的效应影响时，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在豁免成功时不受伤害，豁免失败时只承受一半伤害。其无法在失能时使用此特质。

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]].

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds [[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]] to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmSlam0000000000]] 攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。

Aversion to Fire.name: 厌火
Aversion to Fire.description: 若 [[lookup @name]] 受到火焰伤害，则进行的攻击检定和属性检定将具有劣势，直至其下一回合结束。

Averse.name: 畏惧
Averse.description: 你进行的攻击检定和属性检定将具有劣势，直至下一回合结束。

Berserk.name: 失心狂怒
Berserk.description:
若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在回合开始时&Reference[Bloodied]，掷 [[/r 1d6]]。骰值为 6 时，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 开始失心狂怒。[[lookup @name lowercase]] ，其在其回合内攻击距其最近的其可见的生物。若没有生物位于其能够移动并攻击到的范围内，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 攻击物件。一旦 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 开始失心狂怒，狂怒持续至其被摧毁或其不再浴血。

若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的创造者位于[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @range.value activity=tnkOsrSwEElO2kZM]] 尺内，则创造者能够以动作进行一次 [[/check ability=cha skill=per dc=@abilities.str.dc]]检定以试图让 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 冷静下来。此时 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 必须能听见其创造者。检定成功则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 不再狂怒直至其下个回合开始，若此时 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 仍浴血，则为狂怒特质重新投掷d6。

Berserk.name: 失心狂怒
Berserk.description: 你开始失心狂怒。你狂怒期间，其在其回合内攻击距其最近的其可见的生物。若没有生物位于其能够移动并攻击到的范围内，则你攻击物件。一旦你开始失心狂怒，狂怒持续至其被摧毁或其不再&Reference[Bloodied apply=false]。

Lightning Absorption.name: 闪电吸收
Lightning Absorption.description: 每当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 将受闪电伤害时，其恢复等于闪电伤害数值的生命值。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmSlam0000000000]] 攻击。

Bandit Deceiver.name: 匪帮欺诈师
Bandit Deceiver.description:
装备：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{匕首（6）}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcWand000000]{魔杖}

匪徒

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.ORyQoMthsD5YZa49 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

匪帮欺诈师

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.mYYcK59M5xX38pXL caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Wand.name: 魔杖
Wand.description: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{奥术法器}是一种利用宝石或是雕刻来引导奥术魔法的物品。术士、魔契师和法师可以使用这种物品作为法器。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .l4INK64V3wIju2AS]] 攻击。

Blinding Flash.name: 目盲闪光
Blinding Flash.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见一点为中心半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]] 尺的球状区域内的所有生物。

失败： [[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

成功：仅半伤。

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至匪帮欺诈师的下一回合开始。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowcase]] 施展以下一道法术，使用智力作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]（4 环版本）, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]（已计入AC）, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMajorImage]

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
你改变自身以及随身的衣物、护甲、武器等在你身上的所有物。该效应在法术终止时结束。肉眼看来你的身高可以有 1 尺的增减，体态可胖可瘦。你必须选择一个和你肢体基础排列方式一致的形态。此外，幻术的影响范围由你决定。

此法术产生的变化无法应对物理检查。比如，你用此法术添了一顶帽子，那么现实物件会从帽子穿过去，且任何触碰帽子的人将摸不到任何东西。

如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Disguised.name: 乔装
Disguised.description: 一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻象
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础 AC 变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。目标着装护甲则法术提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Major Image.name: 高等幻影
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Cunning Action.name: 灵巧动作
Cunning Action.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 执行 &Reference[Dash apply=false]、&Reference[Disengage apply=false] 或 &Reference[Hide apply=false] 动作。

Shortsword.name: 短剑
Shortsword.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的下一回合开始。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至刺客的下一回合开始。

Evasion.name: 反射闪避
Evasion.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 受到一个允许其进行敏捷豁免来只承受一半伤害的效应影响时，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在豁免成功时不受伤害，豁免失败时只承受一半伤害。其无法在失能时使用此特质。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .jLa5l9pntsTVrMKH]]或 [[/item .dL4668G7zXeC5zyY]] 发动共计三次攻击。

Cunning Action.name: 灵巧动作
Cunning Action.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 执行 &Reference[Dash apply=false]、&Reference[Disengage apply=false] 或 &Reference[Hide apply=false] 动作。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Location (Baldur's Gate) Adventure for

Level 7 Characters

Protect an inventor from the Guild.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifClockworkMemo]{Roadside Inn}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.nhztXMmry4TBJgMN]{Clockwork Memories}

Situation. A Gondian inventor named Flurn Eightspoke has unlocked a way to preserve a person’s memories in a clockwork brain. He doesn’t realize his test subject was a Guild informant, and now the Guild wants both Flurn and his mechanical creation destroyed.

Hook. A smith offers the characters a discount in exchange for checking on his former boss, the inventor Flurn Eightspoke, at his Heapside workshop. The smith has heard rumors that Flurn ran afoul of the Guild but can’t imagine what the good-natured inventor could have done to deserve this attention. Alternatively, mechanically oriented characters hear that Flurn has completed a great invention and stop by to check it out.

Encounters

The adventure consists of these encounters.

Eightspoke Workshop. Use the @UUID[Scene.aifClockworkMemo]{Roadside Inn} map in appendix C of the Dungeon Master’s Guide. Use the ground floor only; the upper floor is a rooftop patio and a single room where Flurn sleeps. The workshop is a cluttered, noisy place that smells of cut wood and wet metal. Apart from Flurn Eightspoke (Small, Lawful Neutral @UUID[Actor.aifPriest0000000]{Priest}), eight @UUID[Actor.aifCommoner00000]{Commoners} work as apprentices throughout the workshop.

Clockwork Guards. Six @UUID[Actor.aifNimblewrightG]{Nimblewright Soldiers} (see chapter 9) patrol the workshop grounds, including its roof, in pairs. They ignore the characters as they patrol.

Meeting Flurn. Flurn meets the characters. He has a perpetually puzzled look on his face but a friendly demeanor. Flurn gives the characters a quick tour, concluding with his planning room. He is oblivious to Guild agents who have recently been casing his workshop, and he knows of no trouble.

Storage Barn. The covered barn to the west looks like a stable but it holds supplies: iron ingots in one stall, lumber in another, screws and bolts in another, and so on. A suit of @UUID[Actor.aifAnimatedArmor]{Animated Armor} keeps inventory on a slate board bolted to its chest.

Assembly Room. The workshop’s goods are assembled on the three tables in this room. At least some of Flurn’s apprentices are here around the clock. A mechanical fox named Flywheel (use the @UUID[Actor.aifWeasel0000000]{Weasel} stat block, except it’s a Construct rather than a Beast) prowls this room, demanding frequent head pats.

Forge. The room south of the assembly room is a hot, crowded forge. Molds for several sizes of clockwork gears are stacked haphazardly. A small office connected to the forge holds plans for metal pieces, out of the way of errant embers.

Planning Room. The large room to the east has several drafting tables. The walls and tables bear hundreds of half-finished schematics that demonstrate Flurn’s genius. The planning room holds two items of interest: a brain in a jar that Flurn is using as a model (it belonged to an accountant who knew the secret identity of Heapside’s shadowy kingpin), and a mechanical person with its clockwork brain exposed (use the @UUID[Actor.aifFleshGolem000]{Flesh Golem} stat block). The brass and iron brain is a whirring marvel. Flurn has the mechanical person sit up and asks it to solve a few complex equations on a notepad, but before the demonstration gets too far, the Guild makes its move.

The Guild Strikes. The Guild attack comes in two phases: first, a @UUID[Actor.aifBanditDeceive]{Bandit Deceiver} and two @UUID[Actor.aifSpy0000000000]{Spies} come to the workshop’s west entrance to loudly complain of shoddy work. The apprentices try to mollify them, but when Flurn approaches, the Guild agents try to kill him and any characters accompanying him. Meanwhile, an @UUID[Actor.aifAssassin00000]{Assassin} sneaks over the roof to locate and destroy both the physical brain and the mechanical person. The assassin is disguised as an innocent apprentice. The ruse lets him slip past the workshop’s nimblewright guards. The assassin fights if confronted or if given the opportunity to complete the mission.

The Guards Activate. Once any attempt is made on Flurn’s life, his nimblewrights become Hostile to everyone who doesn’t work at the workshop. Their programming compels them to hunt intruders, which includes the characters. You can use the nimblewrights in pairs or even as a big group to challenge the characters—or to help them if the characters struggle against the Guild intruders.

Valuable Memories. If the characters save Flurn and his mechanical person, the mechanical creation takes the notepad and writes, “They came for me because I know Gregor Undarin, flower merchant, is secretly Guild kingpin of Heapside.” The mechanical person might also share details of Gregor’s shady accounts or the location of Gregor’s hidden vaults of ill-gotten treasure, leading to future adventures. Either way, this knowledge earns the characters the Guild’s enmity for as long as Gregor is in power.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.YsJCgr3GXtV3IU2X caption=false]

Dragon Orb.name: Dragon Orb
Dragon Orb.description:
A Faction (Cult of the Dragon) Adventure for

Level 9 Characters

Retrieve an Artifact for the Cult of the Dragon.

Situation. A Cult of the Dragon cell believes the Orb of Damara (see chapter 8) lies in the trove of Cylrotanth, an Adult Copper Dragon who dwells in the southern Serpent Hills.

Hook. Human Dragonfang Dain Romelin (Medium, Chaotic Evil Cultist Fanatic) hires the characters to retrieve the orb from Cylrotanth’s lair and bring it to him in Soubar, northwest of Triel along the Trade Way near Boareskyr Bridge. Dain claims he has heard the dragon is huge and has reddish scales; he doesn’t admit Cylrotanth is a copper dragon. He offers the party 2,000 GP to complete this mission on the cult’s behalf, and he pays half up front.

Adult Copper Dragon.name: 成年赤铜龙
Adult Copper Dragon.description:
赤铜龙

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.1gZk82d5dqtIeB4K caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。其可以将其中一次攻击替换为 (A) 使用 [[/item .mmSlowingBreath0]] 或 (B) 使用施法施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMindSpike0]（4 环版本）。

Acid Breath.name: 强酸吐息
Acid Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] 尺长、[[lookup @target.template.width activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] 尺宽的线状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害。

成功：半伤。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，无需材料成分并使用魅力作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{侦测魔法}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMindSpike0]{心灵尖刺}（四环版本），@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{次级幻象}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShapechang]{形体变化}（仅限野兽或类人形态，不会因此法术获得临时生命值，且无需为维持此法术而进行专注或保有临时生命值）

每项 1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{高级幻影}

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Mind Spike.name: 心灵尖刺
Mind Spike.description:
指定施法距离内一个可见生物，你驱动一道心灵能量的锥刺侵入目标的心智。目标必须进行一次感知豁免检定，失败则会受到 3d8 心灵伤害，成功则伤害减半。在目标豁免失败时，你在法术结束之前能时刻得知目标所在的位置，只要你们还处于同一位面上。当你拥有这个信息时，目标将不能对你躲藏，并且如果它 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 了，在对抗你时它不能从这个状态中受益。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加1d8。

Spiked.name: 尖刺
Spiked.description: 施法者在法术结束之前能时刻得知你所在的位置，只要你们还处于同一位面上。当施法者拥有这个信息时，你将不能对施法者躲藏，并且如果你&Reference[invisible apply=false]了，在对抗施法者时你不能从这个状态中受益。

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻象
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Shapechange.name: 形体变化
Shapechange.description:
在法术持续时间内，你变形为另一个生物。你可以使用魔法动作来变形为另一个符合条件的形态。新形态必须是一个挑战等级不高于你的级别或挑战等级的生物。你必须在之前见过该生物至少一次，并且它不能是构装或亡灵。

当你变形时，你获得等于新形态生命值的临时生命值。如果你没有临时生命值剩下，该法术提前结束。

你的游戏资料卡替换为选择形态的资料卡，但你保留你的生物类型、阵营、人格

智力、感知、魅力、生命值、生命骰、熟练以及交流的能力。如果你具有施法特性，你同样保留它。

在变形时，你可以决定你的装备落到地上，或者改变其尺寸和形状来适应你的新形态。

Greater Restoration.name: 高等复原术
Greater Restoration.description:
你触碰一名生物并魔法性地移除目标身上的下列效应之一：

  • 1 级 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]{力竭}
  • &Reference[Charmed apply=false]{魅惑}或&Reference[Petrified apply=false]{石化}状态
  • 一道诅咒，包括目标因与一件被诅咒魔法物品的同调所陷入的诅咒。
  • 目标某项属性值的减损
  • 目标生命值上限的降低

materials.value: 价值 100+GP 的钻石尘，作为法术耗材

Major Image.name: 高等幻影
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Giggling Magic.name: 带来笑容的魔法
Giggling Magic.description:
魅力豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Ttrajc4RC5Ut7pkj]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=Ttrajc4RC5Ut7pkj]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，且每当目标进行一次属性检定和攻击检定时，其必须掷 [[/r 1d6]] 并在那次D20检定中承受等量减值，直至其下一回合结束。

失败或成功：此后 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 无法再执行此动作，直至其下个回合开始。

Giggling.name: 笑容
Giggling.description: 每当你进行一次属性检定和攻击检定时，你必须掷 [[/r 1d6]]并在那次D20 检定中承受等量减值，直至其你下一回合结束。

Mind Jolt.name: 心灵震荡
Mind Jolt.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]使用施法施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMindSpike0] （四环版本）。 赤铜龙直至其下个回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Pounce.name: 扑杀
Pounce.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动至多等于其速度一半的距离并发动一次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。

Slowing Breath.name: 缓速吐息
Slowing Breath.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败：直至目标的下一回合结束，目标速度减半，无法执行反应，且目标在其回合中仅可以执行一个动作或一个附赠动作，但不能同时执行二者。

1/2 Speed | Action Restrictions.name: 速度减半并限制动作
1/2 Speed | Action Restrictions.description: 直至你的下一回合结束，你速度减半，无法执行反应，且你在其回合中仅可以执行一个动作或一个附赠动作，但不能同时执行二者。

Cultist Fanatic.name: 邪教狂信者
Cultist Fanatic.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol (Varies)}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}

Cultists

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.VICfYukXoYkWJ1yn caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Cultist Fanatic

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]，法术攻击命中 +4）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{光亮术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{奇术}

2/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000]{命令术}

1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]{定身人类}

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器
Spiritual Weapon.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]，使用其施法动作的施法属性。

z817Et9IPt6qHawH.name: 灵体武器
z817Et9IPt6qHawH.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Flaming Skeleton.name: 燃火骷髅
Flaming Skeleton.description:
骷髅

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.w1RMyPzpjolhQMVX caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

燃火骷髅

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.URA77mxAIyPUKcXr caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Illumination.name: 照明
Illumination.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 散发出半径 15 尺的明亮光照和其外 15 尺的微光光照。

Death Burst.name: 自爆
Death Burst.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在死亡时爆炸。

敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]，源自[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] 尺光环区域内的所有生物。

失败： [[/damage average]]伤害。

成功： 半伤。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .jmtfmb8isTfURSSq]] 或 [[/item .zhyJH2fjFrdV5nRI]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Confer Fire Resistance.name: 赋予火焰抗性
Confer Fire Resistance.description: 骑乘[[lookup @name lowercase]]期间，[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以赋予一名骑手对火焰伤害的抗性。

Resistance: Fire.name: 抗性：火焰
Resistance: Fire.description: 骑乘梦魇期间，梦魇可以赋予一名骑手对火焰伤害的抗性。

Illumination.name: 照明
Illumination.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 散发出半径 10 尺的明亮光照以及额外 10 尺的微光光照。

Ethereal Stride.name: 以太折跃
Ethereal Stride.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]和其 [[lookup @range.value activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] 尺内至多三名自愿的生物一起从物质位面传送至以太位面，或反之。

Loathsome Limbs.name: 扰人断肢
Loathsome Limbs.description:
若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在任意回合结束时浴血，并且曾在此回合中受到 15+ 挥砍伤害， [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的其中一条肢体会被切断，落到 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 所在的空间中，成为一条 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmTrollLimb00000]。断肢在[[lookup @name lowcase]] 的回合结束后立即行动。[[lookup @name lowcase]] 每有一条失去的肢体，其便获得 1 级 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]，[[lookup @name lowcase]] 会在下次恢复生命值时长出失去的肢体。

Foundry Note

此特性在角色卡的“效应”选项卡中提供了一个“激活效应”状态，以启用力竭的每一级。由于该状态可多次应用，所以 GM 必须手动管理力竭的等级。力竭的每一级都有一个可用的激活效应。

Exhaustion 1.name: 1 级力竭
Exhaustion 1.description: 你每有一条失去的肢体，获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Exhaustion 2.name: 2 级力竭
Exhaustion 2.description: 你每有一条失去的肢体，获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Exhaustion 3.name: 3 级力竭
Exhaustion 3.description: 你每有一条失去的肢体，获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Grappled.name: 受擒

Grappled and Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled and Restrained.description:

成功：仅半伤。

Poisoned & Blinded.name: 中毒并目盲
Poisoned & Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至憎恶蛇人的下一回合结束。中毒期间，你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态。

Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).name: 施法（仅蛇人形态）
Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展以下一道法术，无需材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]（仅蛇）

3/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]变形为大型的蛇，或变回其真实形态。若其死亡，则其保持在当前的形态不变。除注明部分外，其各形态下游戏数据均相同。[[lookup @name lowercase]]着装或携带的任何装备都不会随之变化。

Animal Friendship.name: 化兽为友
Animal Friendship.description:
在施法距离内指定一只你能看见的野兽。该野兽必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。如果你或你的盟友对目标造成伤害，法术将提前终止。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就可以多选择一个野兽作为目标。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 你在法术持续时间内被施加者&Reference[charmed apply=false]。如果施加者或施加者的盟友对你造成伤害，则法术终止。

Suggestion.name: 暗示术
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不明显涉及伤害目标及其盟友的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内或直到你或你的盟友对其造成伤害前陷入魅惑。被魅惑的目标会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: 遵循暗示
Pursuing Suggestion.description: 被魅惑的你会尽其所能地执行施法者所描述的行为。施法者所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果施法者所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在你完成了施法者的要求后随即终止。

Radiant Strike.description: 近战攻击检定：[[/attack]]，触及 [[lookup @range.value activity=zJ3acnDA3C9uZ5BO]] 尺。[[/damage average extended]]。
