扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器
Spiritual Weapon.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Faction (Order of the Gauntlet) Adventure for

Level 2 Characters

Defend a temple from bloodthirsty goblins.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifShalespirePri]{Shalespire Priory}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.yK6BqU2HW5b4CR9C]{The Siege of Shalespire Priory}

Situation. Raiders commanded by the @UUID[Actor.aifHobgoblinCapt]{Hobgoblin Captain} Lac the Breaker lay siege to the Priory of Shalespire, a place of shelter for travelers and pilgrimage site for the faithful of Lathander.

Hook. The characters are resting at the priory as the raiders are spotted. The monks and clergy won’t survive without the party’s help and desperately ask for aid.

Encounters

The encounters listed below outline the siege. Use the @UUID[Scene.aifShalespirePri]{priory map}. The south and west areas of the temple are built into the adjacent hillside.

Everyone, Inside! War horns blare as raiders rush the priory grounds. Three @UUID[Actor.aifGoblinWarrior]{Goblin Warriors} and a @UUID[Actor.aifGoblinBoss000]{Goblin Boss}, all riding @UUID[Actor.aifWolf000000000]{Wolves}, attempt to ride down a dozen panicked @UUID[Actor.aifCommoner00000]{Commoners} running for the safety of the priory. Monks release messenger pigeons requesting reinforcement, a day’s ride away. The raiders, a hundred strong, surround the priory.

The Siege Begins. An @UUID[Actor.aifOgre000000000]{Ogre}, wielding a battering ram and backed up by three @UUID[Actor.aifHobgoblinWarr]{Hobgoblin Warriors}, attempts to force the main door. Meanwhile, three @UUID[Actor.aifBugbearWarrio]{Bugbear Warriors} hide in the courtyard to ambush anyone who attempts to escape the priory. If the party defeats both groups, the raiders fall back, building a camp. Otherwise, defenders abandon the temple, retreating into the shelter of the sanctuary and living quarters.

Reprieve. The party has a chance to take a Short Rest. The characters might bolster the faith and courage of civilians trapped in the priory, reinforce doors, make barricades, and set improvised traps for invaders. Four @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagPotionofHea]{Potions of Healing} are stored in the vault. The sanctuary is protected by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell. It blocks Fiends from entering, and Humanoids in the sanctuary can’t gain the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition. A @UUID[Actor.aifPriestAcolyte]{Priest Acolyte} at the priory can heal one creature.

Overnight Assault. Lac’s forces make many assaults on the priory. Use the groups below in any order or combination. Each is a low-difficulty encounter; for a high-difficulty encounter, combine two groups:

  • Four @UUID[Actor.aifGoblinWarrior]{Goblin Warriors} and a @UUID[Actor.aifGoblinBoss000]{Goblin Boss}
  • Three @UUID[Actor.aifHobgoblinWarr]{Hobgoblin Warriors} and a @UUID[Actor.aifWorg000000000]{Worg}
  • A @UUID[Actor.aifBugbearWarrio]{Bugbear Warrior} and four @UUID[Actor.aifWolf000000000]{Wolves}
  • Two @UUID[Actor.aifOgrillonOgre0]{Ogrillon Ogres}

Predawn. Just before sunup, Lac sends six @UUID[Actor.aifHobgoblinWarr]{Hobgoblin Warriors} in to soften up the characters, entering battle after these minions are defeated.

The Sun Rises. A troop of mounted @UUID[Actor.aifKnight0000000]{Knights} led by a @UUID[Actor.aifPriest0000000]{Priest} of Lathander arrives at dawn. The characters can sally forth to rout the remaining raiders.

Conclusion. Each character is awarded a gold @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.items.Item.aifSymbolOfLatha]{symbol of Lathander} set with a ruby and worth 100 GP. Each character’s Renown Score with the Order of the Gauntlet increases by 1.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.kLteuEjcyAHrveMu caption=false]

The Foehammer Horn.name: The Foehammer Horn
The Foehammer Horn.description:
A Deity (Tempus) Adventure for

Level 11 Characters

Recover a relic sacred to the storm god.

Situation. The Foehammer Horn, a relic of Tempus, has surfaced in a tomb in the Fields of the Dead. Tempus has sent visions of the relic to various individuals, prompting them to race to the site and compete to claim the horn.

Hook. A character who reveres Tempus dreams of taking up the Foehammer Horn, waking with clear knowledge of the relic’s location.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] also creates one of the following effects:

Sap. The target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s' next turn.

Maneuver. One ally who can see or hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take a &Reference[Reaction apply=false]{Reaction} to move up to half the ally’s Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

Disadvantage.name: Disadvantage
Disadvantage.description: The target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of the attacking creaturer’s next turn.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of the target’s next turn.

Speed: -10 ft..name: Speed: -10 ft.
Speed: -10 ft..description: The target’s Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of the target’s next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .cWEx0aUNtgAiphWk]] or [[/item .UYIXz9iBOnpRuR1H]] in any combination.

Tactical Charge.name: Tactical Charge
Tactical Charge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed straight toward an enemy it can see without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

Counterattack.name: Counterattack
Counterattack.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack roll.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make one [[/item .cWEx0aUNtgAiphWk]] or [[/item .UYIXz9iBOnpRuR1H]]Longbow attack against the attacker.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

Expend Use.name: Expend Use
Expend Use.condition: The warrior is hit by an attack roll

+4 AC.name: +4 AC
+4 AC.description: The target adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Maneuver.name: Maneuver
Maneuver.description: One [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=WMz2y2H5SLCDAxCF]] who can see or hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take a Reaction to move up to half the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=WMz2y2H5SLCDAxCF]]’s Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

Berserker Commander.name: Berserker Commander

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can also move up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Silver Sword.name: Silver Sword
Silver Sword.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Critical Hit: If the target is in an astral body (as with the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAstralProj]{Astral Projection} spell), the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body instead of dealing damage.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand} (the hand is Invisible)

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplNondetecti]{Nondetection} (self only), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTongues000]{Tongues}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Nondetection.name: Nondetection
Nondetection.description: For the duration, you hide a target that you touch from Divination spells. The target can be a willing creature, or it can be a place or an object no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. The target can’t be targeted by any Divination spell or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

materials.value: a pinch of diamond dust worth 25+ GP, which the spell consumes

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

materials.value: a forked, metal rod worth 250+ GP and attuned to a plane of existence

affects.special: you and up to eight willing creatures

Telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
Telekinesis.description:
You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell and as a Magic action on your later turns before the spell ends, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.

Creature. You can try to move a Huge or smaller creature. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell’s range. Until the end of your next turn, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained] condition, and if you lift it into the air, it is suspended there. It falls at the end of your next turn unless you use this option on it again and it fails the save.

Object. You can try to move a Huge or smaller object. If the object isn’t being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell’s range.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you pull the object away and move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell’s range.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

K191ZU4UrvUcJQ4f.name: Misty Step
K191ZU4UrvUcJQ4f.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item Slam]] or [[/item Force Bolt]] in any combination.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow} spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

rHwlDG85kUcrUFdg.name: Slow
rHwlDG85kUcrUFdg.description:
You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot Cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

An affected target's Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs<=25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell's gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

The inline roll above will return 1 if it succeeded or 0 if it failed.

Slowed.name: Slowed
Slowed.description:
An affected target’s Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can’t take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs>25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell’s gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Spell Immunity.name: Spell Immunity
Spell Immunity.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical choices include @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeatMetal0]{Heat Metal}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Arcane Sword]] attacks.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .vTZW4dSRGXTDWvRd]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmShieldBash0000]].

Shield Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield Bash.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] [[lookup @range.units activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]]. that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds [[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]] to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Use.name: Use

Aura of Bravery.name: Aura of Bravery
Aura of Bravery.description: Creatures of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=N8uK4xdPCXdknRTb]]-foot Emanation originating from it have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions while there.

Charmed & Frightened.name: Charmed & Frightened
Charmed & Frightened.description: Targets have immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions while there.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .ogiSGKeLqpw2g1ek]] or [[/item .xqMyOHm4l8Kqx6K6]] in any combination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00]{Daylight}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPhantomSte]{Phantom Steed}

Daylight.name: Daylight
Daylight.description:
For the duration, sunlight spreads from a point within range and fills a 60-foot-radius Sphere. The sunlight’s area is Bright Light and sheds Dim Light for an additional 60 feet.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn’t being worn or carried, causing the sunlight to fill a 60-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the sunlight.

If any of this spell’s area overlaps with an area of Darkness created by a spell of level 3 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Dispel Evil and Good.name: Dispel Evil and Good
Dispel Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn’t there already. If they aren’t on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

affects.special: Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead
Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead

Dispelling Evil and Good.name: Dispelling Evil and Good
Dispelling Evil and Good.description: For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions: Break Enchantment or Dismissal.

Greater Restoration.name: Greater Restoration
Greater Restoration.description:
You touch a creature and magically remove one of the following effects from it:

  • 1 &Reference[Exhaustion] level
  • The &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Petrified] condition
  • A curse, including the target’s Attunement to a cursed magic item
  • Any reduction to one of the target’s ability scores
  • Any reduction to the target’s Hit Point maximum

materials.value: diamond dust worth 100+ GP, which the spell consumes

Phantom Steed.name: Phantom Steed
Phantom Steed.description:
A Large, quasi-real, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbsumPhantomSte]{horselike creature} appears on the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice within range. You decide the creature’s appearance, and it is equipped with a saddle, bit, and bridle. Any of the equipment created by the spell vanishes in a puff of smoke if it is carried more than 10 feet away from the steed.

For the duration, you or a creature you choose can ride the steed. The steed uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRidingHors]{Riding Horse} stat block (see appendix B), except it has a Speed of 100 feet and can travel 13 miles in an hour. When the spell ends, the steed gradually fades, giving the rider 1 minute to dismount. The spell ends early if the steed takes any damage.

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Deity (Tempus) Adventure for

Level 11 Characters

Recover a relic sacred to the storm god.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifBarrowCrypt00]{Barrow Crypt}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.zeJrbYYAn2FkF4Mq]{The Foehammer Horn}

Situation. The Foehammer Horn, a relic of Tempus, has surfaced in a tomb in the Fields of the Dead. Tempus has sent visions of the relic to various individuals, prompting them to race to the site and compete to claim the horn.

Hook. A character who reveres Tempus dreams of taking up the Foehammer Horn, waking with clear knowledge of the relic’s location.

Encounters

Use the @UUID[Scene.aifBarrowCrypt00]{Barrow Crypt} map in appendix B of the Dungeon Master’s Guide. On level 1, remove the leftmost stairway leading down. Level 2 consists only of the rightmost stairs, the chamber directly north of these stairs, and the connecting corridor.

Battle Circle. Standing stones encircling the barrow bear pictograms of battle and of Tempus. Within the circle sprawl the corpses of slain warriors. Various survivors, devotees of Tempus, have just discovered the secret entrance to the tomb. All these individuals are Chaotic Neutral and Medium. They include Ysold, a human (@UUID[Actor.aifWarriorComman]{Warrior Commander}); Hisnix, a dwarf (@UUID[Actor.aifBerserkerComm]{Berserker Commander}); and Elegnos, an elf knight (use the @UUID[Actor.aifGithyankiKnig]{Githyanki Knight} stat block, but change the creature type to Humanoid). They are allied and fight interlopers. If not dealt with here, these foes eventually follow the party into the tomb. Ysold has already found the secret door among the stones, and it lies open.

Doors. Complex locks (1 minute to pick) of Superior quality ([[/tool 20 ability=dexterity tool=thief]]) seal all doors in the tomb. Forcing open a door requires a successful [[/skill 20 ath]] check as an action.

Side Entrance. Long ago, tomb raiders carved two holes in the barrow’s western side. The raiders’ remains can still be seen. They were slain by two @UUID[Actor.aifStoneGolem000]{Stone Golems} that resemble Tempus and guard this entrance.

Trooper Hall. The walls of the chamber surrounded by seven tombs depict assembled troops, each soldier with a unique face. The @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGlyphofWar]{Glyph of Warding} spell has been cast on the south and west entrances to this chamber. A rune is triggered if a creature moves through that entrance. Both glyphs use the Explosive Rune option, one dealing Lightning damage and the other Thunder. After a rune is triggered, seven @UUID[Actor.aifHelmedHorror0]{Helmed Horrors} plastered into the walls burst free and ambush intruders.

Clangor Halls. Wall carvings depict the fury of war in the two eastern chambers and stairs down to level 2. When trespassers enter, a war horn sounds, red light illuminates the area, sounds of warfare erupt, and thirteen guardian spirits manifest from burial niches. Four of these spirits have the stat block of a @UUID[Actor.aifGladiator0000]{Gladiator}, and nine have the stat block of a @UUID[Actor.aifBerserker0000]{Berserker}, but all are Celestials instead of Humanoids.

War Erupts

The Light and Tokens are pre-placed and can be toggled on when war erupts.

When the spirits begin combat, each character must succeed on a [[/save 15 wis]] saving throw or enter a battle fury. Characters in a battle fury have Advantage on attack rolls using Strength, but attack rolls against them have Advantage, and the character can’t take the Disengage or Dodge actions. At the end of their turn, characters in a battle fury repeat the saving throw, ending the fury on a success. When the last spirit is defeated, any battle fury affecting a character ends.

Pillared Hall. Double doors seal this hall on the east and west. Within, wall carvings portray warriors in celebration. A simple altar to Tempus occupies a long southern niche, while narrower alcoves hold old crates and barrels of military rations long turned to dust. A character who prays to Tempus at the altar can use it to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeroesFeas]{Heroes' Feast} without spell components. Once used in this way, the altar becomes nonmagical.

Foehammer Hall. Stairs descend to a single hall with two supporting columns. Niches line the walls, which depict Tempus battling various foes. Shelves in the niches hold broken implements of war. When all the characters have entered, a horn sounds, the northern wall cracks, and an avatar of Tempus charges from it. Use the @UUID[Actor.aifQuestingKnigh]{Questing Knight} stat block for the avatar, changing creature type to Celestial and any Radiant damage to Fire damage. When the avatar drops to 0 Hit Points, it rises again as a @UUID[Actor.aifBerserkerComm]{Berserker Commander} (change its creature type to Celestial) with all its Hit Points and continues to fight. If defeated again, it is destroyed.

Conclusion. With the avatar’s defeat, the crack in the northern wall crumbles, revealing the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.items.Item.aifHornOfValhall]{Foehammer Horn}: a bronze @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgHornofValhall]{Horn of Valhalla}.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.AWzFFn7Yn8aGdvCW caption=false]

The Vault of Velsharoon.name: The Vault of Velsharoon
The Vault of Velsharoon.description:
A Faction (Red Wizard) Adventure for

Level 8 Characters

Explore catacombs devoted to the god of liches.

Situation. Red Wizards have discovered a lost vault dedicated to the demigod Velsharoon, patron of liches and others who seek undeath. The vault lies hidden beneath an ancient burial ground in Rashemi territory.

Hook. Honored Sage Varelles, a respected Red Wizard, offers the party the honor of plundering the vault on his behalf and bringing any arcane lore there back to him. He warns that others also seek the vault, so speed is of the essence.

Haunting Revenant.name: 还魂巨构
Haunting Revenant.description:
还魂鬼

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.MIgxduVUrgHmADPd caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

还魂巨构

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.NalhxqwOlHZ5t2u7 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Haunted Zone.name: 缠魂之地
Haunted Zone.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xmF8v1o2HyVyepb6]]，在 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的空间中施展法术的所有生物。

失败：该法术失败并被浪费。

Undead Restoration.name: 不死再造
Undead Restoration.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 死亡，它会在 24 小时内复生，死亡，除非对其遗留物施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]，否则其在 24 小时后复生。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 复生后会活化同一存在位面中的另一个超巨型物件或建筑；这会改变其外形，但不会改变其游戏数据，且归来时 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 具有全部生命值。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmObjectSlam0000]] 攻击并使用 [[/item .mmInvitation0000]]。

Object Slam.name: 物件猛袭
Object Slam.description: 近战或远程攻击检定： [[/attack]]（若目标位于 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 所处的空间内则具有优势），触及 [[lookup @item.range.reach]] 尺或射程 [[lookup @item.range.value]]/[[lookup @item.range.long]] 尺。命中：[[/damage average]]伤害。

Invitation.name: 请君入瓮
Invitation.description:
魅力豁免检定： DC 17，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败： 目标被传送至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 所在的空间内并被吞下。被吞下的生物对 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 体外的攻击或其他效应而言处于全身掩护。

只要 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 仍具有生命值，被吞下的生物就不能离开还魂巨构所在的空间，除非其使用能够在位面之间旅行的魔法，例如法术位面转移。

Total Cover.name: 全身掩护
Total Cover.description: 你对还魂巨构体外的攻击或其他效应而言处于全身掩护。

Death Knight Aspirant.name: 死亡骑士志从
Death Knight Aspirant.description:
死亡骑士志从

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.IC2tkedmjZBt4733 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.YODr1hp93SXFKzLn caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Marshal Undead.name: 不死统帅
Marshal Undead.description: 只要 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未陷入失能状态，位于源自[[lookup @name lowcase]]的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=WbzFmVAOPQ7eL6IW]] 尺光环区域内的由其选择的（除自身之外的）任意亡灵都在攻击检定和豁免检定中具有优势。

Adv: Attacks & Saves.name: 优势：攻击和豁免
Adv: Attacks & Saves.description: 只要死亡骑士未陷入失能状态，你在攻击检定和豁免检定中具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mOFhWkASKsQxw6ni]] 攻击。

Hellfire Orb.name: 地狱火珠
Hellfire Orb.description:
敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=q3tW0wl3eLe2rDU9]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=q3tW0wl3eLe2rDU9]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见一点为中心，半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=q3tW0wl3eLe2rDU9]] 尺球状区域内的所有生物。

失败： [[/damage average]]伤害。

成功： 半伤。

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗那次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令那次攻击失手）。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展以下一道法术，无需任何材料成分并使用魅力作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPhantomSte]

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDestructiv]（暗蚀），@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]

Phantom Steed.name: 魅影驹
Phantom Steed.description:
一匹大型，拟真的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbsumPhantomSte]出现在施法距离内你选择的一处地面上的未占空间中。你决定该生物的样貌，且它装备着鞍座、嚼子和缰绳。这些随法术创造的装备一旦离开坐骑10尺即化作一阵烟消失不见。

在法术持续时间内，你或者一名你指定的生物可以骑乘此坐骑。坐骑使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRidingHors] 的数据（见附录 B），不过其具有 100 尺速度，每小时可行进 13 里。法术终止时，坐骑会慢慢消失，骑手有 1 分钟的时间下马。坐骑受到伤害时，法术将提前终止。

Destructive Wave.name: 湮灭波
Destructive Wave.description: 毁灭能量从你身上扩散而出，覆盖了 30 尺光环范围。光环范围内你选择的每个生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者受到 5d6 点雷鸣伤害和 5d6 点光耀或暗蚀伤害（由你选择）并且陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。豁免成功只受一半伤害。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Elemental Restoration.name: 元素重生
Elemental Restoration.description: p class="feature">若[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @item.requirements]] 于水元素位面之外死去，其身躯会化为海水，并在[[/r 1d4#天]] 天后于水元素位面某处获得一具新的身体，以满生命值复活。

Wishes.name: 祈愿
Wishes.description: 每个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 都有 [[/r 1d100cs<31#Knows Wish on 1]]{30%} 概率知晓法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]。若知晓，则[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以但仅能在有非巨灵生物向其许愿（以[[lookup @name lowercase]]能理解的方式）时为那个生物施展此法术。[[lookup @name lowercase]]为该生物施展祈愿术将不会承受祈愿术的负担。一旦此[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展过三次祈愿术，其接下来 365 天内无法再次施展此法术。

Wish.name: 祈愿术
Wish.description:
祈愿术 是凡间生物所能施展的最强大法术。你只需要大声说出自己的愿望就能改变现实世界本身。

法术最基础的用法是用来模仿任意一个八环或更低环阶的法术。如果你以此种方式使用该法术，你不需要满足目标法术所需的任何前提条件（包括有价值的材料成分）就可以让该法术生效。

除此之外，你也可以选择创造下列效应其中之一：

创造物件。 你创造出一个价值不超过 25000gp 的物件，该物件不能是魔法物品。该物件最长尺寸不能超过 300 尺，并随法术出现在地面上你能看见的一处未被占据位置。

即刻治疗。 你让你自己和至多二十个你可见的生物恢复其全部生命值，并且终止它们身上一切在高等复原术中描述过的所有效应。

伤害抗性。 你让至多十个你能看见的生物对你所指定的一种伤害类型具有抗性。这个抗性是永久存在的。

免疫法术。 你让最多十个你能看见的生物在接下来的八小时内免疫某种法术或其他魔法效应。

突来学识。 你将你的一个专长替换为符合条件的另一个专长。你失去旧专长带来的全部好处，并获得新专长的好处。你无法取代作为你其他专长或特性先决条件的专长。

重新掷骰。 你改变一件刚刚发生的事件。重掷前一轮的任意一次掷骰（包括你前一回合进行的掷骰），并让现实随着你的新掷骰结果改变。例如，祈愿术可以撤销队友的失败豁免或敌人的重击。你可以迫使重新进行的掷骰具有优势或劣势，并且可以选择是使用重投后的结果还是使用原来的结果。

重塑现实。 你可能会许愿一些没有包含在其他所有效应中的东西。为了做到这样，尽可能准确地向地下城主描述你的愿望。地下城主在这种情况下有极高的自由来裁决会发生什么。不过愿望越大，出错的概率就越大。法术可能会直接失败，也可能部分的达成你想要的结果，你还有可能因表述愿望时措辞不当而遭到意想不到的结果。例如，许愿让一个坏人死去可能会让你穿越到多年后该人已死的一个时间段，使你相当于离开了游戏一样。此外，许愿获取一件传说中的魔法物品或神器可能会立即将你传送到该物品当前的持有者身边。如果你许的愿望太过庞大，其效应影响到了社群、区域或是世界，你可能会引来强大的敌人。如果你的愿望会影响神，这名神的神仆会立刻干涉，阻止它或是鼓励你以一种特殊的方式许愿。如果你的愿望将会撤销多元宇宙本身，威胁到了印记城，或者以某种方式影响到了痛苦女士，你的心灵中就会浮现出她的影像：她摇了摇自己的脑袋，然后你的愿望失效了。

了模仿其他法术外，施展该法术以达成的任何其他目的都会使你的身躯承受极大的负担。承受负担期间，直到你完成长休之前，你每次施展法术时都将受到一定伤害（伤害数值取决于你施展的法术的环阶，每环阶 1d10 的暗蚀伤害），此伤害无法被任何方式减免。此外，你的力量属性值将降至 3（除非它已经是 3 或更低），持续 2d4 日。这段时间内，你每花一整日休息（不从事轻度活动以外的行为），恢复需要的日数就减少 2 日。最后，如果你承受了这种负担，你将有 [[/r 1d3cs1]]{33%} 的概率永远也无法再次施放祈愿术。

Wish Stress.name: 祈愿代价
Wish Stress.description: 你每次施展法术时都将受到一定伤害（伤害数值取决于你施展的法术的环阶，每环阶 [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] 伤害），此伤害无法被任何方式减免。此外，你的力量属性值将降至 3（除非它已经是 3 或更低），持续 [[/r 2d4]] 天。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmAquaticLash000]] 攻击。

Water Jet.name: 水柱喷射
Water Jet.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]] 尺长，[[lookup @target.template.width activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]] 宽线状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。若目标生物体型不超过巨型，则其被 [[lookup @name lowcase] ]直线推开至多 20 尺并陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

成功： 仅半伤。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若你的生物体型不超过巨型，则被水巨灵直线推开至多 20 尺并陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展以下一道法术，无需材料成分并使用魅力作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]）：

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCreateorDe]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPurifyFood]

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplControlWat]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTongues000]

Create or Destroy Water.name: 造水术/枯水术
Create or Destroy Water.description:
你选择其一执行：

造水术。 你在施法距离内一个打开的容器中创造至多10加仑干净的水。作为另一种选项，你使施法距离内一处30尺的立方区域降下雨水并浇灭区域内不受遮盖的火焰。

枯水术。你使施法距离内一个打开的容器里至多10加仑水枯竭不见。作为另一种选项，你使施法距离内一片30尺立方 区域的浓雾消失不见。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就多创造或多枯竭10加仑额外的水分，另一种选项能影响的立方 区域边长增加5尺。

Detect Evil and Good.name: 侦测善恶
Detect Evil and Good.description:
在法术持续时间内，你定位距你 30 尺内任何异怪、天族、元素、妖精、邪魔、亡灵。你也可以感知到范围内是否具有激活的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHallow0000] 并确定其位置。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Purify Food and Drink.name: 净化饮食
Purify Food and Drink.description: 以施法距离内一点为中心，你移除半径 5 尺球状区域内非魔法食物与饮品中的毒素和腐败。

Control Water.name: 操控水体
Control Water.description:
直到法术结束为止，你控制你指定的一处边长 100 尺的立方区域中的任意一处独立水体，从以下效应中选择其一生效。在你之后的每个自己回合中，你可以用一个魔法动作重复同一效应，或是选择另一效应。

上涨。你使控制区域内水位上涨至多20尺。如果你指定的区域是一片大水体中的一部分，则你改为制造一片 20 尺高的波浪，并从区域的一边扑向另一边再拍下水面。波浪中任何巨型Huge或更小的载具都会被带到水浪行进的另一边。且所有巨型或更小的载具都有 [[/r 1d100cs<26#Vehicle is capsized]]{25%} 的几率倾覆。

直至法术终止或你选择另一个效应前，水位的上涨情况将保持不变。如果该效应用以产生波浪，则波浪在你下一回合开始时再次进行翻打。

分水。你使区域内的水体分开并形成一条水体的沟壑。沟壑从法术区域的一头延伸到另一头，而被分开的水体则在两边形成两道水墙。沟壑持续存在至法术终止或直至你选择另一个效应。该效应终止时，水流会逐渐在下一轮中将沟壑填满，直至其恢复成通常的水位。

转向。你使区域内的水体向一个你自选的方向流动，即使水流需要绕过障碍，或沿着墙壁向上流，甚至流向一些不太可能的方向，区域内的水体都将遵照你指使的方向流动，但一旦其流出法术区域，则会重新基于其所在地形选择流向。水体持续向你所选方向流动，直至法术终止或直至你选择另一效应。

漩涡。该效应需要水体至少为 50 尺的方形区域并且至少有 25 尺深。你在区域中央形成一个漩涡。其形态为底部宽 5 尺，顶部宽 50 尺，高 25 尺。水中任何距漩涡 25 尺内的生物或物件均被漩涡向自身拉动 10 尺。当一名生物在一个回合内第一次进入漩涡或在漩涡内结束其回合时，受影响的生物进行一次力量豁免。豁免失败则受到 2d8 点钝击伤害。豁免成功则只受一半伤害。一名生物若想以游泳方式离开漩涡，则必须先用一个动作远离漩涡并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定。

Gaseous Form.name: 气化形体
Gaseous Form.description:
在法术持续时间内，你将触碰到的一名自愿生物连同其穿着携带物一起转化为一团云雾。如果目标的生命值降至 0 或其用一个魔法动作终止其身上的法术效应，则那个目标身上的法术终止。

在该形态下，目标唯一的移动方式即是 10 尺的飞行速度，且可以悬浮。该目标可以进入并占据一个已有生物占据的空间。其拥有钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性，其对 &Reference[prone apply=false] 状态免疫，且进行力量、敏捷和体质豁免时具有优势。该目标可以穿过狭隙，但会将液态物质视为固体表面。

云雾形态的目标不能讲话或操作物件，其随身携带或持握的物件不会掉落，也不能被使用或与之互动。另外，目标也不能攻击或施法。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，就可以额外再指定一名生物作为法术目标。

Gaseous Form.name: 气化形体
Gaseous Form.description: 在该形态下，你唯一的移动方式即是 10 尺的飞行速度，且可以悬浮。你可以进入并占据一个已有生物占据的空间。其拥有钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性，其对 &Reference[prone apply=false] 状态免疫，且进行力量、敏捷和体质豁免时具有优势。你可以穿过狭隙，但会将液态物质视为固体表面。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Plane Shift.name: 位面转移
Plane Shift.description:
你和至多八名手牵着手形成一个圆圈的生物被输送到一个不同的存在位面。你可以概括地指名一个目的地，比如火元素位面的黄铜之城或九层地狱第二层迪斯帕特的宫殿，按照DM的判断，你将出现在目的地里或其附近。

另外，如果你知道某个处于另一位面的传送法阵的印记序列，则该法术可以把你带到该法阵处。如果该传送法阵太小而装不下所有你输送的生物，则他们会出现在离传送法阵最近的未占空间中。

materials.value: 一根与一个存在位面调谐的价值 250+GP 的分叉金属棒

affects.special: 你和至多八名自愿的生物

Tongues.name: 巧言术
Tongues.description: 此法术赋予你触碰的一名生物理解任何其能看见或听见的口语或手语的能力。此外，当目标生物以口语或手语进行交流时，任何能听见其话语或看见其手语，且知道至少一门语言的生物都能理解它。

Misty Veil.name: 迷雾之幕
Misty Veil.description: [[lookup @name lowcase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00] ，使用其施法动作的施法属性。

Fog Cloud.name: 云雾术
Fog Cloud.description:
你以施法距离内一点为中心创造一片半径 20 尺的球状浓雾。球状区域被&Reference[heavilyobscured]{重度遮蔽}浓雾持续至法术持续时间结束，但仍可被强风（比如@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{造风术}创造的风）吹散。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，浓雾的半径就增加 20 尺。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .mmSlam0000000000]] or [[/item .mmForceBolt00000]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Slow.name: 缓慢
Slow.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSlow000000]，无需法术成分并使用体质作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）。

rHwlDG85kUcrUFdg.name: 缓慢
rHwlDG85kUcrUFdg.description:
你在施法距离内一处 40 尺立方区域内指定至多六个生物并扭曲其周围的时间流。每个目标都要进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则受到该法术影响直至法术终止。

被影响的生物的速度减半，而其 AC 和敏捷豁免都具有 -2 减值，且不能执行反应。该生物在其回合内可以执行一个动作或一个附赠动作，但不能在一回合内同时执行以上两者。当它执行攻击动作时，它只能发动一次攻击。

如果该生物尝试施展一个具有姿势Somatic成分的法术，有 [[/r 1d100cs<=25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25%} 的可能法术会因为生物的动作太慢而施展失败。

受术生物在每个其自己回合结束时可以再进行一次该感知豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上的该法术效应。

Foundry Note

上面的内联掷骰如果成功则返回 1，如果失败则返回 0。

Slowed.name: 缓速
Slowed.description:
你的速度减半，而其 AC 和敏捷豁免都具有-2 减值，且不能执行反应。你在其回合内可以执行一个动作或一个附赠动作，但不能在一回合内同时执行以上两者。当你执行攻击动作时，你只能发动一次攻击。

如果你尝试施展一个具有姿势成分的法术，有 [[/r 1d100cs<=25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25%} 的可能法术会因为你的动作太慢而施展失败。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Faction (Red Wizard) Adventure for

Level 8 Characters

Explore catacombs devoted to the god of liches.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifVaultOfVelsha]{Vault Of Velsharoon}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.zsSYawuVAqRNtjb2]{The Vault of Velsharoon}

Situation. Red Wizards have discovered a lost vault dedicated to the demigod Velsharoon, patron of liches and others who seek undeath. The vault lies hidden beneath an ancient burial ground in Rashemi territory.

Hook. Honored Sage Varelles, a respected Red Wizard, offers the party the honor of plundering the vault on his behalf and bringing any arcane lore there back to him. He warns that others also seek the vault, so speed is of the essence.

Encounters

Use the map below. The vault’s main features and inhabitants are as follows.

1: Entrance. A withered corpse, killed by a blast of necrotic energy from wards on the pillars, lies here. The wards are now spent, and the pillars nonmagical.

2: Hall of the Blessed Dead. The massive statue of a lich fills the center of this room. Four withered bodies are scattered about. The statue is a @UUID[Actor.aifHauntingReven]{Haunting Revenant}. It killed rival explorers and tries to kill the party as well.

3: Sarcophagi. Each sarcophagus holds a @UUID[Actor.aifDeathKnightAs]{Death Knight Aspirant}. If a sarcophagus is opened, the death knight begins combat.

4: Fountain of Dark Knowledge. A fountain of unholy water churns in the room’s center. Narbossa, a @UUID[Actor.aifMarid00000000]{Marid} drained of color and vitality by the necromantic energy of the vault, is bound to the fountain. Narbossa longs to return to the Elemental Plane of Water. It is Indifferent to the characters, and the spell binding the marid to the fountain can be ended with the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic} spell (DC 14). If the party fails to end the binding, the marid initiates combat. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgNecklaceOfPra]{Necklace of Prayer Beads} lies submerged in the fountain.

5: Library. The library holds dozens of rare and ancient books on necromancy, as well as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgTomeOfClearTh]{Tome of Clear Thought}. A statue depicting Velsharoon is a @UUID[Actor.aifStoneGolem000]{Stone Golem} that fights if the books are touched.

6: Puzzle Sphere. A sphere of complex, interlocking metal bands with an inky void at its core floats in this room. A character who takes a &Reference[Study] action to inspect the sphere and succeeds on a [[/skill 20 arc]] check deduces incantations required to make the sphere’s bands align, opening a portal to Mungoth, the third layer of Gehenna, where Velsharoon’s divine realm is found.

Conclusion. Varelles pays [[/award 5000gp]] for the books from the library, doubling his offer if the party brings him the Tome of Clear Thought unused. Each character’s Renown Score with the Red Wizards increases by 1.
